title.text: RFC 7970: The Incident Object Description Exchange Format Version 2

contents.text:
Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF)                        R. Danyliw
Request for Comments: 7970                                          CERT
Obsoletes: 5070, 6685                                      November 2016
Category: Standards Track
ISSN: 2070-1721
The Incident Object Description Exchange Format Version 2
contents.zh-CHS: 事件对象描述交换格式版本2

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: The Incident Object Description Exchange Format (IODEF) defines a data representation for security incident reports and indicators commonly exchanged by operational security teams for mitigation and watch and warning. This document describes an updated information model for the IODEF and provides an associated data model specified with the XML schema. This new information and data model obsoletes RFCs 5070 and 6685.
contents.zh-CHS: 事件对象描述交换格式（IODEF）定义了安全事件报告和指标的数据表示形式，这些报告和指标通常由运营安全团队交换，用于缓解、监视和警告。本文档描述了IODEF的更新信息模型，并提供了用XML模式指定的关联数据模型。这种新的信息和数据模型淘汰了RFC5070和6685。

contents.text: Status of This Memo
contents.zh-CHS: 关于下段备忘

contents.text: This is an Internet Standards Track document.
contents.zh-CHS: 这是一份互联网标准跟踪文件。

It has received public review and has been approved for publication by the Internet Engineering Steering Group (IESG). Further information on Internet Standards is available in Section 2 of RFC 7841.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件是互联网工程任务组（IETF）的产品。它代表了IETF社区的共识。它已经接受了公众审查，并已被互联网工程指导小组（IESG）批准出版。有关互联网标准的更多信息，请参见RFC 7841第2节。

contents.zh-CHS: 有关本文件当前状态、任何勘误表以及如何提供反馈的信息，请访问http://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc7970.

1. Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 介绍

contents.text: Organizations require help from other parties to mitigate malicious activity targeting their network and to gain insight into potential threats. This coordination might entail working with an ISP to filter attack traffic, contacting a remote site to take down a botnet, or sharing watch lists of known malicious indicators in a consortium.
contents.zh-CHS: 组织需要其他各方的帮助，以减轻针对其网络的恶意活动，并深入了解潜在威胁。这种协调可能需要与ISP合作过滤攻击流量，联系远程站点关闭僵尸网络，或者在一个联盟中共享已知恶意指示器的监视列表。

contents.text: The Incident Object Description Exchange Format (IODEF) is a format for representing computer security information commonly exchanged between Computer Security Incident Response Teams (CSIRTs) or other operational security teams. It provides an XML representation for conveying:
contents.zh-CHS: 事件对象描述交换格式（IODEF）是一种表示计算机安全事件响应团队（CSIRT）或其他操作安全团队之间通常交换的计算机安全信息的格式。它提供了一种XML表示，用于传达：

contents.text: o indicators to characterize a threat;
contents.zh-CHS: o 确定威胁特征的指标；

contents.text: o security incident reports to document attacks against an organization;
contents.zh-CHS: o 安全事件报告，记录对组织的攻击；

contents.text: o response activity taken or that could be taken in response to an incident; and
contents.zh-CHS: o 针对事件采取或可能采取的响应活动；和

contents.text: o metadata so that these various classes of information can be exchanged among parties.
contents.zh-CHS: o 元数据，以便这些不同类别的信息可以在各方之间交换。

contents.text: The purpose of the IODEF is to enhance the operational capabilities of CSIRTs. Adoption of the IODEF will improve the ability of a CSIRT to resolve security incidents; understand threats; and coordinate response activities and proactive mitigations by simplifying collaboration and data sharing with its partners. This structured format provided by the IODEF allows for:
contents.zh-CHS: IODEF的目的是增强CSIRT的作战能力。采用IODEF将提高CSIRT解决安全事件的能力；了解威胁；通过简化与合作伙伴的协作和数据共享，协调应对活动和主动缓解措施。IODEF提供的这种结构化格式允许：

contents.text: o machine-to-machine exchange of incident and indicator data;
contents.zh-CHS: o 事件和指示器数据的机器间交换；

contents.text: o automated processing of this data whereby allowing more rapid execution of appropriate courses of action; and
contents.zh-CHS: o 自动处理这些数据，从而允许更快速地执行适当的行动方案；和

contents.text: o the development of an ecosystem of interoperable tools enabling security operations.
contents.zh-CHS: o 开发可互操作工具的生态系统，以实现安全操作。

contents.text: Sharing and coordinating with other organizations is not strictly a technical problem. There are numerous procedural, cultural, legal, and trust-related barriers to overcome. The IODEF does not attempt to address them directly. However, operational implementations of the IODEF will need to consider these challenges.
contents.zh-CHS: 与其他组织共享和协调并非严格意义上的技术问题。有许多程序、文化、法律和与信任相关的障碍需要克服。IODEF不会尝试直接解决这些问题。然而，IODEF的操作实现将需要考虑这些挑战。

contents.text: Section 1 provides the background for the IODEF. Sections 3 and 8 specify the IODEF information and data model, respectively. The data types used in this document are described in Section 2. Processing considerations, extending the specification, internationalization, and security issues are covered in Sections 4, 5, 6, and 9, respectively. Examples are listed in Section 7.
contents.zh-CHS: 第1节提供了IODEF的背景。第3节和第8节分别规定了IODEF信息和数据模型。第2节介绍了本文件中使用的数据类型。第4、5、6和9节分别介绍了处理注意事项、扩展规范、国际化和安全问题。第7节列出了示例。

contents.text: 1.1. Terminology
The key words "MUST," "MUST NOT," "REQUIRED," "SHALL," "SHALL NOT," "SHOULD," "SHOULD NOT," "RECOMMENDED," "MAY," and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in [RFC2119].
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件中的关键词“必须”、“不得”、“要求”、“应”、“不应”、“应”、“不应”、“建议”、“可”和“可选”应按照[RFC2119]中所述进行解释。

contents.text: 1.2. Notations

The IODEF is specified as an Extensible Markup Language (XML) [W3C.XML] schema [W3C.SCHEMA]. The normative IODEF data model is found in the XML schema in Section 8. To aid in the understanding of the data elements, Section 3 also depicts the underlying information model using Unified Modeling Language (UML). This abstract presentation of the IODEF is not normative.
contents.zh-CHS: IODEF被指定为可扩展标记语言（XML）[W3C.XML]模式[W3C.schema]。在第8节的XML模式中可以找到标准的IODEF数据模型。为了帮助理解数据元素，第3节还使用统一建模语言（UML）描述了底层信息模型。IODEF的这一抽象表述不规范。

contents.text: For clarity in this document, the term "XML document" will be used when referring generically to any instance of an XML document. The term "IODEF document" will be used to refer to an XML document conforming to the IODEF specification. The terms "schema" will be used to refer to Section 8 of this document. The terms "data model" and "schema" will be used interchangeably. The terms "class" and "element" will be used to reference either the corresponding data element in the UML-based information or XML schema-based data models, respectively.
contents.zh-CHS: 为清楚起见，在本文档中，当泛指XML文档的任何实例时，将使用术语“XML文档”。术语“IODEF文档”将用于指符合IODEF规范的XML文档。术语“模式”将用于指代本文件第8节。术语“数据模型”和“模式”将互换使用。术语“类”和“元素”将分别用于引用基于UML的信息或基于XML模式的数据模型中的相应数据元素。

contents.text: 1.3. About the IODEF Data Model
contents.zh-CHS: 1.3. 关于IODEF数据模型

contents.text: A number of considerations were made in the design of the IODEF data model.
contents.zh-CHS: 在设计IODEF数据模型时考虑了许多因素。

contents.text: o The data model found in this document is an evolution of the one previously specified in [RFC5070]. New fields were added to represent additional information. [RFC5070] was developed primarily to represent incident reports. This document builds upon it by adding support for indicators and revising it to reflect the current challenges faced by CSIRTs. An attempt was made to preserve backward compatibility, but this was not possible in all cases. See Section 4.4. This document obsoletes [RFC5070].
contents.zh-CHS: o 本文件中的数据模型是[RFC5070]中先前规定的数据模型的演变。添加了新字段以表示其他信息。[RFC5070]主要用于表示事故报告。本文件在此基础上增加了对指标的支持，并对其进行了修订，以反映CSIRT当前面临的挑战。曾试图保持向后兼容性，但并非在所有情况下都能做到这一点。见第4.4节。本文件废除了[RFC5070]。

contents.text: o The IODEF is a transport format. Therefore, the data model may not be the optimal archival or in-memory processing format.
contents.zh-CHS: o IODEF是一种传输格式。因此，数据模型可能不是最佳的存档或内存处理格式。

contents.text: o The IODEF is intended to be a framework to convey only commonly exchanged information. It ensures that there are mechanisms for extensibility to support organization-specific information and techniques to reference information kept outside of the data model.
contents.zh-CHS: o IODEF旨在作为一个框架，仅传达通常交换的信息。它确保存在支持特定于组织的信息的可扩展性机制和引用数据模型之外的信息的技术。

contents.text: o Not all commonly exchanged information has a well-defined format or taxonomy. The IODEF attempts to strike a balance between enforcing sufficient structure to allow automated processing and supporting free-form content that enables maximum flexibility.
contents.zh-CHS: o 并非所有通常交换的信息都有定义良好的格式或分类。IODEF试图在强制执行足够的结构以允许自动处理和支持自由格式内容以实现最大灵活性之间取得平衡。

contents.text: o The IODEF fits into a broader ecosystem of standards and conventions. An attempt was made to harmonize the data model with this context.
contents.zh-CHS: o IODEF符合更广泛的标准和公约生态系统。试图使数据模型与此上下文相协调。

contents.text: 1.4. Changes from RFC 5070
contents.zh-CHS: 1.4. RFC 5070的变更

contents.text: A detailed list of additions made to the data model in [RFC5070] are enumerated in this section. See Section 4.4 for a list of incompatible changes.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节列举了[RFC5070]中对数据模型所做添加的详细列表。有关不兼容更改的列表，请参见第4.4节。

contents.text: o Updated the data types (Section 2) to improve internationalization, clarify ambiguity, and ensure consistency in extensions.
contents.zh-CHS: o 更新了数据类型（第2节），以改进国际化、澄清歧义并确保扩展的一致性。

contents.text: o Added the observable-id attribute (Section 3.3.2) and IndicatorData class (Section 3.28) to represent indicators.
contents.zh-CHS: o 添加了可观察id属性（第3.3.2节）和IndicatorData类（第3.28节）以表示指标。

contents.text: o Added the private-enum-name and private-enum-id attributes to the IODEF-Document class (Section 3.1) to disambiguate private extensions.
contents.zh-CHS: o 将私有枚举名称和私有枚举id属性添加到IODEF文档类（第3.1节）以消除私有扩展的歧义。

contents.text: o Updated the Incident class (Section 3.2) to represent additional timing and workflow information.
contents.zh-CHS: o 更新了事件类别（第3.2节），以表示其他时间和工作流信息。

contents.text: o Added the ThreatActor (Section 3.7) and Campaign (Section 3.8) classes to represent attack attribution information.
contents.zh-CHS: o 添加了ThreatActor（第3.7节）和Campaign（第3.8节）类来表示攻击归因信息。

contents.text: o Updated the Contact class (Section 3.9) and its children to improve internationalization and represent additional information about an entity.
contents.zh-CHS: o 更新了Contact类（第3.9节）及其子类，以改进国际化并表示有关实体的附加信息。

contents.text: o Updated the Method class (Section 3.11) to improve extensibility through externally referenced resources.
contents.zh-CHS: o 更新了方法类（第3.11节），以通过外部引用资源提高可扩展性。

contents.text: o Added the Discovery class (Section 3.10) to describe how an incident was discovered.
contents.zh-CHS: o 增加了发现类（第3.10节）来描述事件是如何发现的。

contents.text: o Updated the Assessment class (Section 3.12) to enable more descriptive characterizations of the impact of an incident.
contents.zh-CHS: o 更新了评估等级（第3.12节），以便对事件的影响进行更具描述性的描述。

contents.text: o Updated the HistoryItem (Section 3.13.1) and Expectation (Section 3.15) classes to support a reference to a course of action.
contents.zh-CHS: o 更新了HistoryItem（第3.13.1节）和Expection（第3.15节）课程，以支持对行动方案的引用。

contents.text: o Updated the EventData class (Section 3.14) with additional metadata added to the Incident class.
contents.zh-CHS: o 更新了EventData类（第3.14节），并向事件类添加了其他元数据。

contents.text: o Updated the System class (Section 3.17) with additional metadata.
contents.zh-CHS: o 使用附加元数据更新了系统类（第3.17节）。

contents.text: o Updated the Counter class (Section 3.18.3) to support additional rate metrics.
contents.zh-CHS: o 更新了计数器类（第3.18.3节），以支持其他费率指标。

contents.text: o Added DomainData (Section 3.19), EmailData (Section 3.21), WindowsRegistryKeysModified (Section 3.23), CertificateData (Section 3.24), and FileData (Section 3.25) classes to improve the description of an incident and support this data as indicators.
contents.zh-CHS: o 添加了DomainData（第3.19节）、EmailData（第3.21节）、WindowsRegistryKeysModified（第3.23节）、CertificateData（第3.24节）和FileData（第3.25节）类，以改进对事件的描述，并支持将此数据作为指标。

contents.text: o Added the SignatureData (Section 3.27) and HashData (Section 3.26) classes to represent digital signatures and hashes.
contents.zh-CHS: o 添加了SignatureData（第3.27节）和HashData（第3.26节）类来表示数字签名和哈希。

contents.text: o Added support for public enumerated attribute extensions using IANA registries (Section 5.1.2).
contents.zh-CHS: o 增加了对使用IANA注册表的公共枚举属性扩展的支持（第5.1.2节）。

contents.text: o Updated numerous enumerated attributes for completeness.
contents.zh-CHS: o 更新了大量枚举属性以确保完整性。

contents.text: 2. IODEF Data Types
contents.zh-CHS: 2. IODEF数据类型

contents.text: The IODEF uses a number of simple and complex types. This section describes these data types.
contents.zh-CHS: IODEF使用了许多简单和复杂的类型。本节介绍这些数据类型。

contents.text: 2.1. Integers
An integer is represented in the information model by the INTEGER data type. Integer data MUST be encoded in Base 10.
contents.zh-CHS: 在信息模型中，整数由整数数据类型表示。整数数据必须以10为基数进行编码。

contents.text: The INTEGER data type is implemented in the data model as an "xs:integer" type per Section 3.3.13 of [W3C.SCHEMA.DTYPES].
contents.zh-CHS: 根据[W3C.SCHEMA.DTYPES]第3.3.13节，整数数据类型在数据模型中实现为“xs:INTEGER”类型。

contents.text: 2.2. Real Numbers
A real (floating-point) number is represented in the information model by the REAL data type. Real data MUST be encoded in Base 10.
contents.zh-CHS: 在信息模型中，实数（浮点）由实数数据类型表示。实际数据必须以10为基数进行编码。

contents.text: The REAL data type is implemented in the data model as an "xs:float" type per Section 3.2.4 of [W3C.SCHEMA.DTYPES].
contents.zh-CHS: 根据[W3C.SCHEMA.DTYPES]第3.2.4节，实际数据类型在数据模型中实现为“xs:float”类型。

contents.text: 2.3. Characters and Strings
contents.zh-CHS: 2.3. 字符和字符串

contents.text: A single character is represented in the information model by the CHARACTER data type. A string is represented by the STRING data type. Special characters MUST be encoded using entity references. See Section 4.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 单个字符在信息模型中由字符数据类型表示。字符串由字符串数据类型表示。特殊字符必须使用实体引用进行编码。见第4.1节。

contents.text: The CHARACTER and STRING data types are implemented in the data model as an "xs:string" type per Section 3.2.1 of [W3C.SCHEMA.DTYPES].
contents.zh-CHS: 根据[W3C.SCHEMA.DTYPES]第3.2.1节，字符和字符串数据类型在数据模型中实现为“xs:STRING”类型。

contents.text: 2.4. Multilingual Strings
contents.zh-CHS: 2.4. 多语言字符串

contents.text: A string that needs to be represented in a human-readable language different than the default encoding of the document is represented in the information model by the ML_STRING data type.
contents.zh-CHS: 需要以不同于文档默认编码的人类可读语言表示的字符串在信息模型中由ML_字符串数据类型表示。

contents.text: The ML_STRING data type is implemented in the data model as the "iodef:MLStringType" type. This type extends the "xs:string" to include two attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: ML_字符串数据类型在数据模型中实现为“iodef:MLStringType”类型。此类型扩展了“xs:string”以包含两个属性。

contents.text: Figure 1: The iodef:MLStringType Type
contents.zh-CHS: 图1:iodef:MLStringType类型

contents.text: The content of the class is a character string of type "xs:string" whose language MAY be specified by the xml:lang attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: 类的内容是“xs:string”类型的字符串，其语言可以由xml:lang属性指定。

contents.text: The attributes of the iodef:MLStringType type are:
contents.zh-CHS: iodef:MLStringType类型的属性为：

contents.text: xml:lang Optional. ENUM. A language identifier per Section 2.12 of [W3C.XML] whose values and format are described in [RFC5646]. The interpretation of this code is described in Section 6.
contents.zh-CHS: xml:lang可选。枚举。[W3C.XML]第2.12节规定的语言标识符，其值和格式如[RFC5646]所述。本规范的解释见第6节。

contents.text: translation-id Optional. STRING. An identifier to relate other instances of this class with the same parent as translations of this text. The scope of this identifier is limited to all of the direct, peer child classes of a given parent class.
contents.zh-CHS: 翻译id可选。一串一个标识符，用于将此类的其他实例与此文本的翻译相同的父类相关联。此标识符的范围仅限于给定父类的所有直接对等子类。

contents.text: Using this class enables representing translations of the same text in multiple languages. Each translation is a distinct instance of this class with a common parent. A group of classes each with a translated instance of text is related by setting a common identifier in the translation-id attribute. The language of a given class is set by the xml:lang attribute. See Section 6 for more details on representing translations of free-form text.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用此类可以用多种语言表示同一文本的翻译。每个翻译都是此类的一个独特实例，具有一个公共父类。通过在translation id属性中设置公共标识符，将一组类（每个类都有一个已翻译的文本实例）关联起来。给定类的语言由xml:lang属性设置。有关表示自由格式文本翻译的更多详细信息，请参见第6节。

contents.text: 2.5. Binary Strings
contents.zh-CHS: 2.5. 二进制字符串

contents.text: Binary octets can be represented with two encodings.
contents.zh-CHS: 二进制八位字节可以用两种编码表示。

contents.text: 2.5.1. Base64 Bytes
contents.zh-CHS: 2.5.1. Base64字节

contents.text: A binary octet encoded with base64 is represented in the information model by the BYTE data type. A sequence of these octets is of the BYTE[] data type.
contents.zh-CHS: 在信息模型中，用base64编码的二进制八位字节由字节数据类型表示。这些八位字节的序列是BYTE[]数据类型。

contents.text: The BYTE and BYTE[] data types are implemented in the data model as an "xs:base64Binary" type per Section 3.2.16 of [W3C.SCHEMA.DTYPES].
contents.zh-CHS: The BYTE and BYTE[] data types are implemented in the data model as an "xs:base64Binary" type per Section 3.2.16 of [W3C.SCHEMA.DTYPES].translate error, please retry

contents.text: 2.5.2. Hexadecimal Bytes
contents.zh-CHS: 2.5.2. 十六进制字节

contents.text: A binary octet encoded as a character tuple consistent of two hexadecimal digits is represented in the information model by the HEXBIN data type. A sequence of these octets is of the HEXBIN[] data type.
contents.zh-CHS: 在信息模型中，编码为两个十六进制数字一致的字符元组的二进制八位字节由HEXBIN数据类型表示。这些八位字节的序列属于HEXBIN[]数据类型。

contents.text: The HEXBIN and HEXBIN[] data types are implemented in the data model as an "xs:hexBinary" type per Section 3.2.15 of [W3C.SCHEMA.DTYPES].
contents.zh-CHS: 根据[W3C.SCHEMA.DTYPES]第3.2.15节，HEXBIN和HEXBIN[]数据类型在数据模型中实现为“xs:hexBinary”类型。

contents.text: 2.6. Enumerated Types
contents.zh-CHS: 2.6. 枚举类型

contents.text: An enumerated type is represented in the information model by the ENUM data type. It is an ordered list of acceptable string values. Each value has a representative keyword. Within the data model, the enumerated type keywords are used as attribute values.
contents.zh-CHS: 枚举类型在信息模型中由枚举数据类型表示。它是可接受字符串值的有序列表。每个值都有一个代表性的关键字。在数据模型中，枚举类型关键字用作属性值。

contents.text: The ENUM data type is implemented in the data model as values of an "xs:NMTOKEN" type per Section 3.3.4 of [W3C.SCHEMA.DTYPES].
contents.zh-CHS: 根据[W3C.SCHEMA.DTYPES]第3.3.4节，枚举数据类型在数据模型中作为“xs:NMTOKEN”类型的值实现。

contents.text: 2.7. Date-Time String
contents.zh-CHS: 2.7. 日期时间字符串

contents.text: A date-time string that describes a particular instant in time is represented in the information model by the DATETIME data type. Ranges are not supported.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述特定时间瞬间的日期时间字符串在信息模型中由DATETIME数据类型表示。不支持范围。

contents.text: The DATETIME data type is implemented in the data model as an "xs:dateTime" type per Section 3.2.7 of [W3C.SCHEMA.DTYPES].
contents.zh-CHS: 根据[W3C.SCHEMA.DTYPES]第3.2.7节，DATETIME数据类型在数据模型中实现为“xs:DATETIME”类型。

contents.text: 2.8. Timezone String
contents.zh-CHS: 2.8. 时区字符串

contents.text: A timezone offset from UTC is represented in the information model by the TIMEZONE data type. It is formatted according to the following regular expression: "Z|[\+\-](0[0-9]|1[0-4]):[0-5][0-9]".
contents.zh-CHS: 与UTC的时区偏移在信息模型中由时区数据类型表示。它根据以下正则表达式进行格式化：“Z |[\+\-]（0[0-9]| 1[0-4]）：[0-5][0-9]”。

contents.text: The TIMEZONE data type is implemented in the data model as an "iodef:TimezoneType" type.
contents.zh-CHS: 时区数据类型在数据模型中实现为“iodef:TimezoneType”类型。

contents.text: 2.9. Port Lists
contents.zh-CHS: 2.9. 端口列表

contents.text: A list of network ports is represented in the information model by the PORTLIST data type. A PORTLIST consists of a comma-separated list of numbers and ranges (N-M means ports N through M, inclusive). It is formatted according to the following regular expression: "\d+(\-\d+)?(,\d+(\-\d+)?)*". For example, "2,5-15,30,32,40-50,55-60".
contents.zh-CHS: 网络端口列表在信息模型中由PORTLIST数据类型表示。端口列表由逗号分隔的数字和范围列表组成（N-M表示端口N到M，包括在内）。它根据以下正则表达式进行格式化：“\d+（\-\d+）（，\d+（\-\d+）？*”。例如，“2,5-15,30,32,40-50,55-60”。

contents.text: The PORTLIST data type is implemented in the data model as an "iodef:PortlistType" type.
contents.zh-CHS: PORTLIST数据类型在数据模型中作为“iodef:PortlistType”类型实现。

contents.text: 2.10. Postal Address
contents.zh-CHS: 2.10. 邮政地址

contents.text: A postal address is represented in the information model by the POSTAL data type. The format of the POSTAL data type is documented in Section 2.23 of [RFC4519] as a free-form multi-line string separated by the "$" character.
contents.zh-CHS: 在信息模型中，邮政地址由邮政数据类型表示。[RFC4519]第2.23节将邮政数据类型的格式记录为自由格式的多行字符串，由“$”字符分隔。

contents.text: The POSTAL data type is implemented in the data model as an "iodef:MLStringType" type.
contents.zh-CHS: 邮政数据类型在数据模型中实现为“iodef:MLStringType”类型。

contents.text: 2.11. Telephone Number
contents.zh-CHS: 2.11. 电话号码

contents.text: A telephone number is represented in the information model by the PHONE data type. The format of the PHONE data type is documented in [E.164].
contents.zh-CHS: 在信息模型中，电话号码由电话数据类型表示。电话数据类型的格式记录在[E.164]中。

contents.text: The PHONE data type is implemented in the data model as an "xs:string" type per Section 3.2.1 of [W3C.SCHEMA.DTYPES].
contents.zh-CHS: 根据[W3C.SCHEMA.DTYPES]第3.2.1节，电话数据类型在数据模型中实现为“xs:string”类型。

contents.text: 2.12. Email String
contents.zh-CHS: 2.12. 电子邮件字符串

contents.text: An email address is represented in the information model by the EMAIL data type. The format of the EMAIL data type is documented in Section 3.4.1 of [RFC5322] and Section 3.3 of [RFC6531].
contents.zh-CHS: 电子邮件地址在信息模型中由电子邮件数据类型表示。电子邮件数据类型的格式记录在[RFC5322]的第3.4.1节和[RFC6531]的第3.3节中。

contents.text: The EMAIL data type is implemented in the data model as an "xs:string" type per Section 3.2.1 of [W3C.SCHEMA.DTYPES].
contents.zh-CHS: 根据[W3C.SCHEMA.DTYPES]第3.2.1节，电子邮件数据类型在数据模型中实现为“xs:string”类型。

contents.text: 2.13. Uniform Resource Locator Strings
contents.zh-CHS: 2.13. 统一资源定位器字符串

contents.text: A uniform resource locator (URL) is represented in the information model by the URL data type. The format of the URL data type is documented in [RFC3986].
contents.zh-CHS: 统一资源定位器（URL）在信息模型中由URL数据类型表示。URL数据类型的格式记录在[RFC3986]中。

contents.text: The URL data type is implemented as an "xs:anyURI" type per Section 3.2.17 of [W3C.SCHEMA.DTYPES].
contents.zh-CHS: 根据[W3C.SCHEMA.DTYPES]第3.2.17节，URL数据类型被实现为“xs:anyURI”类型。

contents.text: 2.14. Identifiers and Identifier References
contents.zh-CHS: 2.14. 标识符和标识符引用

contents.text: An identifier unique to the IODEF document is represented in the information model by the ID data type. A reference to this identifier is represented by the IDREF data type.
contents.zh-CHS: IODEF文档的唯一标识符在信息模型中由ID数据类型表示。对该标识符的引用由IDREF数据类型表示。

contents.text: The ID and IDREF data types are implemented in the model as "xs:ID" and "xs:IDREF" types per Sections 3.3.8 and 3.3.9 of [W3C.SCHEMA.DTYPES].
contents.zh-CHS: 根据[W3C.SCHEMA.DTYPES]第3.3.8节和第3.3.9节，ID和IDREF数据类型在模型中实现为“xs:ID”和“xs:IDREF”类型。

contents.text: 2.15. Software
A particular version of software is represented in the information model by the SOFTWARE data type. This software can be described by using a reference, a URL, or with free-form text.
contents.zh-CHS: 在信息模型中，软件的特定版本由软件数据类型表示。可以使用引用、URL或自由格式文本来描述此软件。

contents.text: The SOFTWARE data type is implemented in the data model as the "iodef:SoftwareType" type.
contents.zh-CHS: 软件数据类型在数据模型中实现为“iodef:SoftwareType”类型。

contents.text: Figure 2: The SoftwareType Type
contents.zh-CHS: 图2:SoftwareType类型

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the SoftwareType type are:
contents.zh-CHS: SoftwareType类型的聚合类包括：

contents.text: SoftwareReference Zero or one. Reference to a software application. See Section 2.15.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 软件参考零或一。对软件应用程序的引用。见第2.15.1节。

contents.text: URL Zero or more. URL. A URL to a resource describing the software.
contents.zh-CHS: URL为零或更多。网址。描述软件的资源的URL。

contents.text: Description Zero or more. ML_STRING. A free-form text description of the software.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明零或更多。ML_字符串。软件的自由格式文本描述。

contents.text: At least one of these classes MUST be present.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些类中必须至少有一个存在。

contents.text: The iodef:SoftwareType type has no attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: iodef:SoftwareType类型没有属性。

contents.text: 2.15.1. SoftwareReference Class
contents.zh-CHS: 2.15.1. 软件参考类

contents.text: The SoftwareReference class is a reference to a particular version of software.
contents.zh-CHS: SoftwareReference类是对特定版本软件的引用。

contents.text:
+----------------------+
| SoftwareReference    |
+----------------------+
| xs:any               |
|                      |
| ENUM spec-name       |
| STRING ext-spec-name |
| ENUM dtype           |
| STRING ext-dtype     |
+----------------------+
Figure 3: The SoftwareReference Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图3:SoftwareReference类

contents.text: The element content varies according to the value of the spec-name attribute. It is defined in the data model as "xs:any" per [W3C.SCHEMA].
contents.zh-CHS: 元素内容根据等级库名称属性的值而变化。它在数据模型中根据[W3C.SCHEMA]定义为“xs:any”。

contents.text: The attributes of the SoftwareReference class are:
contents.zh-CHS: SoftwareReference类的属性包括：

contents.text: spec-name Required. ENUM. Identifies the format and semantics of the element body of this class. Formal standards and specifications can be referenced as well as a free-form text description with a user-provided data type. These values are maintained in the "SoftwareReference-spec-id" IANA registry per Section 10.2
contents.zh-CHS: 需要规格名称。枚举。标识此类的元素体的格式和语义。可以引用正式的标准和规范，也可以使用用户提供的数据类型引用自由格式的文本描述。根据第10.2节，这些值保存在“SoftwareReference spec id”IANA注册表中

contents.text: 1. custom. The element content is free-form and of the data type specified by the dtype attribute. If this value is selected, then the dtype attribute MUST be set.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 风俗元素内容是自由格式的，并且是由dtype属性指定的数据类型。如果选择此值，则必须设置dtype属性。

contents.text: 2. cpe. The element content describes a Common Platform Enumeration (CPE) entry per [NIST.CPE].
contents.zh-CHS: 2. cpe。元素内容根据[NIST.CPE]描述了公共平台枚举（CPE）条目。

contents.text: 3. swid. The element content describes a software identification (SWID) tag per [ISO19770].
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 斯威德。元素内容根据[ISO19770]描述了软件标识（SWID）标签。

contents.text: 4. ext-value. A value used to indicate that this attribute is extended and the actual value is provided using the corresponding ext-* attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 外部值。一个值，用于指示此属性已扩展，并使用相应的ext-*属性提供实际值。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: ext-spec-name Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the spec-name attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 外部规范名称可选。一串扩展等级库名称属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: dtype Optional. ENUM. The data type of the element content. The permitted values for this attribute are shown below. The default value is "string". These values are maintained in the "SoftwareReference-dtype" IANA registry per Section 10.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 数据类型可选。枚举。元素内容的数据类型。此属性的允许值如下所示。默认值为“字符串”。根据第10.2节，这些值保存在“软件参考数据类型”IANA注册表中。

contents.text: 1. bytes. The element content is of type HEXBIN.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 字节。元素内容为HEXBIN类型。

contents.text: 2. integer. The element content is of type INTEGER.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 整数元素内容的类型为整数。

contents.text: 3. real. The element content is of type REAL.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 真实的元素内容的类型为REAL。

contents.text: 4. string. The element content is of type STRING.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 一串元素内容的类型为字符串。

contents.text: 5. xml. The element content is XML. See Section 5.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 5. xml。元素内容是XML。见第5.2节。

contents.text: 6. ext-value. A value used to indicate that this attribute is extended and the actual value is provided using the corresponding ext-* attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 外部值。一个值，用于指示此属性已扩展，并使用相应的ext-*属性提供实际值。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: ext-dtype Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the dtype attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: ext数据类型可选。一串扩展数据类型属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: 2.16. Extension
Information not otherwise represented in the IODEF can be added using the EXTENSION data type. This data type is a generic extension mechanism.
contents.zh-CHS: 可以使用扩展数据类型添加IODEF中未以其他方式表示的信息。此数据类型是一种通用扩展机制。

contents.text: The EXTENSION data type is implemented in the data model as the "iodef:ExtensionType" type.
contents.zh-CHS: 扩展数据类型在数据模型中实现为“iodef:ExtensionType”类型。

contents.text: The data type of an EXTENSION is described by the dtype attribute. For simple information, atomic data types (e.g., integers, strings) are supported. Their semantics are further described by the meaning and formatid attributes. Encapsulating XML documents conforming to another schema is also supported. A detailed discussion of extending the schema can be found in Section 5. Additional coordination may be required to ensure that a recipient of a document using this type can parse and process it.
contents.zh-CHS: 扩展的数据类型由dtype属性描述。对于简单信息，支持原子数据类型（例如整数、字符串）。语义由语义和formatid属性进一步描述。还支持封装符合另一模式的XML文档。关于扩展模式的详细讨论见第5节。可能需要额外的协调，以确保使用此类型的文档的收件人能够解析和处理它。

contents.text:
+------------------------+
| iodef:ExtensionType    |
+------------------------+
| xs:any                 |
|                        |
| STRING name            |
| ENUM dtype             |
| STRING ext-dtype       |
| STRING meaning         |
| STRING formatid        |
| ENUM restriction       |
| STRING ext-restriction |
| ID observable-id       |
+------------------------+
Figure 4: The iodef:ExtensionType Type
contents.zh-CHS: 图4:iodef:ExtensionType类型

contents.text: The element content of this type is the extension being added to the data model. This content is defined in the data model as "xs:any" per [W3C.SCHEMA].
contents.zh-CHS: 此类型的元素内容是添加到数据模型的扩展。此内容在数据模型中根据[W3C.SCHEMA]定义为“xs:any”。

contents.text: The attributes of the iodef:ExtensionType type are:
contents.zh-CHS: iodef:ExtensionType类型的属性为：

contents.text: name Optional. STRING. A free-form name of the field or data element.
contents.zh-CHS: 名称可选。一串字段或数据元素的自由格式名称。

contents.text: dtype Required. ENUM. The data type of the element content. The default value is "string". These values are maintained in the "ExtensionType-dtype" IANA registry per Section 10.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 需要数据类型。枚举。元素内容的数据类型。默认值为“字符串”。根据第10.2节，这些值保存在“ExtensionType dtype”IANA注册表中。

contents.text: 1. boolean. The element content is of type BOOLEAN.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 布尔型。元素内容为布尔类型。

contents.text: 2. byte. The element content is of type BYTE.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 字节元素内容的类型为BYTE。

contents.text: 3. bytes. The element content is of type HEXBIN.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 字节。元素内容为HEXBIN类型。

contents.text: 4. character. The element content is of type CHARACTER.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 性格元素内容为字符类型。

contents.text: 5. date-time. The element content is of type DATETIME.
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 日期时间。元素内容的类型为DATETIME。

contents.text: 6. ntpstamp. Same as date-time.
contents.zh-CHS: 6. NTP放大器。和日期时间一样。

contents.text: 7. integer. The element content is of type INTEGER.
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 整数元素内容的类型为整数。

contents.text: 8. portlist. The element content is of type PORTLIST.
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 端口列表。元素内容的类型为PORTLIST。

contents.text: 9. real. The element content is of type REAL.
contents.zh-CHS: 9. 真实的元素内容的类型为REAL。

contents.text: 10. string. The element content is of type STRING.
contents.zh-CHS: 10. 一串元素内容的类型为字符串。

contents.text: 11. file. The element content is a base64-encoded binary file encoded as a BYTE[] type.
contents.zh-CHS: 11. 文件元素内容是一个base64编码的二进制文件，编码为BYTE[]类型。

contents.text: 12. path. The element content is a file-system path encoded as a STRING type.
contents.zh-CHS: 12. 路径元素内容是编码为字符串类型的文件系统路径。

contents.text: 13. frame. The element content is a Layer 2 frame encoded as a HEXBIN type.
contents.zh-CHS: 13. 框架元素内容是编码为HEXBIN类型的第2层帧。

contents.text: 14. packet. The element content is a Layer 3 packet encoded as a HEXBIN type.
contents.zh-CHS: 14. 小包裹元素内容是编码为HEXBIN类型的第3层数据包。

contents.text: 15. ipv4-packet. The element content is an IPv4 packet encoded as a HEXBIN type.
contents.zh-CHS: 15. ipv4数据包。元素内容是编码为HEXBIN类型的IPv4数据包。

contents.text: 16. ipv6-packet. The element content is an IPv6 packet encoded as a HEXBIN type.
contents.zh-CHS: 16. ipv6数据包。元素内容是编码为HEXBIN类型的IPv6数据包。

contents.text: 17. url. The element content is of type URL.
contents.zh-CHS: 17. 网址。元素内容的类型为URL。

contents.text: 18. csv. The element content is a comma-separated value (CSV) list per Section 2 of [RFC4180] encoded as a STRING type.
contents.zh-CHS: 18. csv。元素内容是[RFC4180]第2节规定的逗号分隔值（CSV）列表，编码为字符串类型。

contents.text: 19. winreg. The element content is a Microsoft Windows registry key encoded as a STRING type.
contents.zh-CHS: 19. 温瑞格。元素内容是编码为字符串类型的Microsoft Windows注册表项。

contents.text: 20. xml. The element content is XML. See Section 5.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 20. xml。元素内容是XML。见第5.2节。

contents.text: 21. ext-value. A value used to indicate that this attribute is extended and the actual value is provided using the corresponding ext-* attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 21. 外部值。一个值，用于指示此属性已扩展，并使用相应的ext-*属性提供实际值。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: ext-dtype Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the dtype attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: ext数据类型可选。一串扩展数据类型属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: meaning Optional. STRING. A free-form text description of the element content.
contents.zh-CHS: 意思是可选的。一串元素内容的自由格式文本描述。

contents.text: formatid Optional. STRING. An identifier referencing the format or semantics of the element content.
contents.zh-CHS: formatid是可选的。一串引用元素内容的格式或语义的标识符。

contents.text: restriction Optional. ENUM. See Section 3.3.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 限制是可选的。枚举。见第3.3.1节。

contents.text: ext-restriction Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the restriction attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 外部限制可选。一串扩展限制属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: observable-id Optional. ID. See Section 3.3.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 可观察id可选。ID.见第3.3.2节。

contents.text: 3. The IODEF Information Model
contents.zh-CHS: 3. IODEF信息模型

contents.text: The specifics of the IODEF information model are discussed in this section. Each class and its relationships with the other classes is described. When necessary, clarifications are made about translating this information model to the schema in Section 8.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节将讨论IODEF信息模型的细节。描述了每个类及其与其他类的关系。必要时，将在第8节中说明如何将此信息模型转换为模式。

contents.text: 3.1. IODEF-Document Class
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1. IODEF文档类

contents.text: The IODEF-Document class is the top level class in the IODEF data model. All IODEF documents are an instance of this class.
contents.zh-CHS: IODEF文档类是IODEF数据模型中的顶级类。所有IODEF文档都是此类的实例。

contents.text:
+--------------------------+
| IODEF-Document           |
+--------------------------+
| STRING version           |<>--{1..*}--[ Incident       ]
| ENUM xml:lang            |<>--{0..*}--[ AdditionalData ]
| STRING format-id         |
| STRING private-enum-name |
| STRING private-enum-id   |
+--------------------------+
Figure 5: The IODEF-Document Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图5:IODEF文档类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the IODEF-Document class are:
contents.zh-CHS: IODEF文档类的聚合类包括：

contents.text: Incident One or more. The information related to a single incident. See Section 3.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 一个或多个事件。与单一事件相关的信息。见第3.2节。

contents.text: AdditionalData Zero or more. EXTENSION. Mechanism by which to extend the data model.
contents.zh-CHS: 附加数据为零或更多。扩大用于扩展数据模型的机制。

contents.text: The attributes of the IODEF-Document class are:
contents.zh-CHS: IODEF文档类的属性包括：

contents.text: version Required. STRING. The IODEF specification version number to which this IODEF document conforms. The value of this attribute MUST be "2.00".
contents.zh-CHS: 版本要求。一串本IODEF文件所遵循的IODEF规范版本号。此属性的值必须为“2.00”。

contents.text: xml:lang Optional. ENUM. A language identifier per Section 2.12 of [W3C.XML] whose values and form are described in [RFC5646]. The interpretation of this code is described in Section 6.
contents.zh-CHS: xml:lang可选。枚举。[W3C.XML]第2.12节规定的语言标识符，其值和形式如[RFC5646]所述。本规范的解释见第6节。

contents.text: format-id Optional. STRING. A free-form string to convey processing instructions to the recipient of the document. Its semantics must be negotiated out of band.
contents.zh-CHS: 格式id可选。一串一种自由格式的字符串，用于向文档收件人传递处理指令。它的语义必须在带外协商。

contents.text: private-enum-name Optional. STRING. A globally unique identifier for the CSIRT generating the document to deconflict private extensions used in the document. The fully qualified domain name (FQDN) associated with the CSIRT MUST be used as the identifier. See Section 5.3.
contents.zh-CHS: 私有枚举名称可选。一串生成文档以消除文档中使用的私有扩展冲突的CSIRT的全局唯一标识符。必须将与CSIRT关联的完全限定域名（FQDN）用作标识符。见第5.3节。

contents.text: private-enum-id Optional. STRING. An organizationally unique identifier for an extension used in the document. If this attribute is set, the private-enum-name MUST also be set. See Section 5.3.
contents.zh-CHS: 私有枚举id是可选的。一串文档中使用的扩展的组织唯一标识符。如果设置了此属性，则还必须设置私有枚举名称。见第5.3节。

contents.text: 3.2. Incident Class
contents.zh-CHS: 3.2. 事件类

contents.text: The Incident class describes commonly exchanged information when reporting or sharing derived analysis from security incidents.
contents.zh-CHS: 事件类描述了在报告或共享从安全事件派生的分析时通常交换的信息。

contents.text:
+-------------------------+
| Incident                |
+-------------------------+
| ENUM purpose            |<>----------[ IncidentID      ]
| STRING ext-purpose      |<>--{0..1}--[ AlternativeID   ]
| ENUM status             |<>--{0..*}--[ RelatedActivity ]
| STRING ext-status       |<>--{0..1}--[ DetectTime      ]
| ENUM xml:lang           |<>--{0..1}--[ StartTime       ]
| ENUM restriction        |<>--{0..1}--[ EndTime         ]
| STRING ext-restriction  |<>--{0..1}--{ RecoveryTime    ]
| ID observable-id        |<>--{0..1}--[ ReportTime      ]
|                         |<>----------[ GenerationTime  ]
|                         |<>--{0..*}--[ Description     ]
|                         |<>--{0..*}  [ Discovery       ]
|                         |<>--{0..*}--[ Assessment      ]
|                         |<>--{0..*}--[ Method          ]
|                         |<>--{1..*}--[ Contact         ]
|                         |<>--{0..*}--[ EventData       ]
|                         |<>--{0..1}--[ IndicatorData   ]
|                         |<>--{0..1}--[ History         ]
|                         |<>--{0..*}--[ AdditionalData  ]
+-------------------------+
Figure 6: The Incident Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图6：事件类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the Incident class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 事件类别的聚合类别为：

contents.text: IncidentID One. An incident tracking number assigned to this incident by the CSIRT that generated the IODEF document. See Section 3.4.
contents.zh-CHS: 包括一个。由生成IODEF文档的CSIRT分配给此事件的事件跟踪号。见第3.4节。

contents.text: AlternativeID Zero or one. The incident tracking numbers used by other CSIRTs to refer to the incident described in the document. See Section 3.5.
contents.zh-CHS: 或者是零或者一。其他CSIRT用于引用文档中描述的事件的事件跟踪号。见第3.5节。

contents.text: RelatedActivity Zero or more. Related activity and attribution of this activity. See Section 3.6.
contents.zh-CHS: 相关活动为零或更多。相关活动和该活动的归属。见第3.6节。

contents.text: DetectTime Zero or one. DATETIME. The time the incident was first detected.
contents.zh-CHS: 检测时间为零或一。日期时间。事件首次被发现的时间。

contents.text: StartTime Zero or one. DATETIME. The time the incident started.
contents.zh-CHS: 开始计时零或一。日期时间。事件开始的时间。

contents.text: EndTime Zero or one. DATETIME. The time the incident ended.
contents.zh-CHS: 结束时间0或1。日期时间。事件结束的时间。

contents.text: RecoveryTime Zero or one. DATETIME. The time the site recovered from the incident.
contents.zh-CHS: 恢复时间为0或1。日期时间。现场从事件中恢复的时间。

contents.text: ReportTime Zero or one. DATETIME. The time the incident was reported.
contents.zh-CHS: 报告时间为零或一。日期时间。事件被报道的时间。

contents.text: GenerationTime One. DATETIME. The time the content in this Incident class was generated.
contents.zh-CHS: 第一代。日期时间。生成此事件类中的内容的时间。

contents.text: Description Zero or more. ML_STRING. A free-form text description of the incident.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明零或更多。ML_字符串。事件的自由文本描述。

contents.text: Discovery Zero or more. The means by which this incident was detected. See Section 3.10.
contents.zh-CHS: 发现零或更多。检测此事件的方法。见第3.10节。

contents.text: Assessment Zero or more. A characterization of the impact of the incident. See Section 3.12.
contents.zh-CHS: 评估为零或更多。对事件影响的描述。见第3.12节。

contents.text: Method Zero or more. The techniques used by the threat actor in the incident. See Section 3.11.
contents.zh-CHS: 方法0或更多。事件中威胁行为人使用的技术。见第3.11节。

contents.text: Contact One or more. Contact information for the parties involved in the incident. See Section 3.9.
contents.zh-CHS: 联系一个或多个。事件相关方的联系信息。见第3.9节。

contents.text: EventData Zero or more. Description of the events comprising the incident. See Section 3.14.
contents.zh-CHS: EventData为零或更多。对构成事件的事件的描述。见第3.14节。

contents.text: IndicatorData Zero or one. Indicators from the analysis of an incident. See Section 3.28.
contents.zh-CHS: 指示器数据0或1。事件分析的指标。见第3.28节。

contents.text: History Zero or one. A log of significant events or actions that occurred during the course of handling the incident. See Section 3.13.
contents.zh-CHS: 历史是零还是一。事件处理过程中发生的重大事件或行动的日志。见第3.13节。

contents.text: AdditionalData Zero or more. EXTENSION. Mechanism by which to extend the data model.
contents.zh-CHS: 附加数据为零或更多。扩大用于扩展数据模型的机制。

contents.text: The attributes of the Incident class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 事件类的属性包括：

contents.text: purpose Required. ENUM. The purpose attribute describes the rationale for documenting the information in this class. It is closely related to the Expectation class (Section 3.15). These values are maintained in the "Incident-purpose" IANA registry per Section 10.2. This attribute is defined as an enumerated list:
contents.zh-CHS: 所需的目的。枚举。“目的”属性描述了记录此类信息的基本原理。它与期望等级密切相关（第3.15节）。根据第10.2节，这些值保存在“事故目的”IANA注册表中。此属性定义为枚举列表：

contents.text: 1. traceback. The incident was sent for trace-back purposes.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 追踪。该事件被发送用于追溯目的。

contents.text: 2. mitigation. The incident was sent to request aid in mitigating the described activity.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 缓解。事件被发送至请求协助缓解所述活动。

contents.text: 3. reporting. The incident was sent to comply with reporting requirements.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 报告。事件被发送以符合报告要求。

contents.text: 4. watch. The incident was sent to convey indicators that should be monitored.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 看这一事件是为了传达应加以监测的指标。

contents.text: 5. other. The incident was sent for purposes specified in the Expectation class.
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 另外事件是为Expectation类中指定的目的发送的。

contents.text: 6. ext-value. A value used to indicate that this attribute is extended and the actual value is provided using the corresponding ext-* attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 外部值。一个值，用于指示此属性已扩展，并使用相应的ext-*属性提供实际值。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: ext-purpose Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the purpose attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: ext用途可选。一串扩展目的属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: status Optional. ENUM. The status attribute conveys the state in a workflow where the incident is currently found. These values are maintained in the "Incident-status" IANA registry per Section 10.2. This attribute is defined as an enumerated list:
contents.zh-CHS: 状态可选。枚举。“状态”属性表示当前发现事件的工作流中的状态。根据第10.2节，这些值保存在“事件状态”IANA注册表中。此属性定义为枚举列表：

contents.text: 1. new. The incident is newly reported, and no action has been taken.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 刚出现的这起事件是新报道的，尚未采取任何行动。

contents.text: 2. in-progress. The incident is under investigation.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 正在进行中。事件正在调查中。

contents.text: 3. forwarded. The incident has been forwarded to another party for handling.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 转发。事件已转交另一方处理。

contents.text: 4. resolved. The investigation into the activity in this incident has concluded.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 断然的。对这起事件中的活动的调查已经结束。

contents.text: 5. future. The described activity has not yet been detected.
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 将来尚未检测到所述活动。

contents.text: 6. ext-value. A value used to indicate that this attribute is extended and the actual value is provided using the corresponding ext-* attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 外部值。一个值，用于指示此属性已扩展，并使用相应的ext-*属性提供实际值。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: ext-status Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the status attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 外部状态可选。一串扩展状态属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: xml:lang Optional. ENUM. A language identifier per Section 2.12 of [W3C.XML] whose values and form are described in [RFC5646]. The interpretation of this code is described in Section 6.
contents.zh-CHS: xml:lang可选。枚举。[W3C.XML]第2.12节规定的语言标识符，其值和形式如[RFC5646]所述。本规范的解释见第6节。

contents.text: restriction Optional. ENUM. See Section 3.3.1. The default value is "private".
contents.zh-CHS: 限制是可选的。枚举。见第3.3.1节。默认值为“private”。

contents.text: ext-restriction Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the restriction attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 外部限制可选。一串扩展限制属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: observable-id Optional. ID. See Section 3.3.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 可观察id可选。ID.见第3.3.2节。

contents.text: 3.3. Common Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3. 共同属性

contents.text: There are a number of recurring attributes used in the information model. They are documented in this section.
contents.zh-CHS: 信息模型中使用了许多重复属性。本节对其进行了记录。

contents.text: 3.3.1. restriction Attribute
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.1. 限制属性

contents.text: The restriction attribute indicates the disclosure guidelines to which the sender expects the recipient to adhere for the information represented in this class and its children. This guideline provides no security since there are no technical means to ensure that the recipient of the document handles the information as the sender requested.
contents.zh-CHS: “限制”属性表示发件人希望收件人遵守此类及其子类中表示的信息的披露准则。本指南不提供任何安全性，因为没有技术手段来确保文档收件人按照发件人的要求处理信息。

contents.text: The value of this attribute is logically inherited by the children of this class. That is to say, the disclosure rules applied to this class also apply to its children.
contents.zh-CHS: 该属性的值由此类的子级逻辑继承。也就是说，适用于该类的披露规则也适用于其子类。

contents.text: It is possible to set a granular disclosure policy, since all of the high-level classes (i.e., children of the Incident class) have a restriction attribute. Therefore, a child can override the guidelines of a parent class, be it to restrict or relax the disclosure rules (e.g., a child has a weaker policy than an ancestor; or an ancestor has a weak policy, and the children selectively apply more rigid controls). The implicit value of the restriction attribute for a class that did not specify one can be found in the closest ancestor that did specify a value.
contents.zh-CHS: 可以设置粒度披露策略，因为所有高级类（即事件类的子类）都有一个限制属性。因此，子类可以覆盖父类的指导原则，以限制或放宽披露规则（例如，子类的策略弱于祖先类；或者祖先类的策略弱，子类选择性地应用更严格的控制）。未指定值的类的限制属性的隐式值可以在指定值的最近祖先中找到。

contents.text: This attribute is defined as an enumerated value with a default value of "private". Note that the default value of the restriction attribute is only defined in the context of the Incident class. In other classes where this attribute is used, no default is specified.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性定义为默认值为“private”的枚举值。请注意，限制属性的默认值仅在事件类的上下文中定义。在使用此属性的其他类中，未指定默认值。

contents.text: These values are maintained in the "Restriction" IANA registry per Section 10.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 根据第10.2节，这些值保存在“限制”IANA注册表中。

contents.text: 1. public. The information can be freely distributed without restriction.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 平民的这些信息可以不受限制地自由分发。

contents.text: 2. partner. The information may be shared within a closed community of peers, partners, or affected parties, but cannot be openly published.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 配偶信息可以在由同行、合作伙伴或受影响方组成的封闭社区内共享，但不能公开发布。

contents.text: 3. need-to-know. The information may be shared only within the organization with individuals that have a need to know.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 我需要知道。信息只能在组织内部与需要了解的个人共享。

contents.text: 4. private. The information may not be shared.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 私有的这些信息可能无法共享。

contents.text: 5. default. The information can be shared according to an information disclosure policy pre-arranged by the communicating parties.
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 违约可以根据通信方预先安排的信息披露策略共享信息。

contents.text: 6. white. Same as 'public'.
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 白色与“公共”相同。

contents.text: 7. green. Same as 'partner'.
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 绿色与“合作伙伴”相同。

contents.text: 8. amber. Same as 'need-to-know'.
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 琥珀色与“需要知道”相同。

contents.text: 9. red. Same as 'private'.
contents.zh-CHS: 9. 红色与“私人”相同。

contents.text: 10. ext-value. A value used to indicate that this attribute is extended and the actual value is provided using the corresponding ext-* attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 10. 外部值。一个值，用于指示此属性已扩展，并使用相应的ext-*属性提供实际值。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: 3.3.2. observable-id Attribute
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.2. 可观测id属性

contents.text: The observable-id attribute tags information in the document as an observable so that it can be referenced later in the description of an indicator. The value of this attribute is a unique identifier in the scope of the document. It is used by the ObservableReference class to enumerate observables when defining an indicator with the IndicatorData class.
contents.zh-CHS: 可观测id属性将文档中的信息标记为可观测信息，以便稍后在指标描述中引用。此属性的值是文档范围内的唯一标识符。ObserverReference类在使用IndicatorData类定义指标时使用它来枚举可观察项。

contents.text: 3.4. IncidentID Class

The IncidentID class represents a tracking number that is unique in the context of the CSIRT. It serves as an identifier for an incident or a document identifier when sharing indicators. This identifier would serve as an index into a CSIRT's incident handling or knowledge management system.
contents.zh-CHS: IncidentID类表示在CSIRT上下文中唯一的跟踪号。它用作事件的标识符或共享指标时的文档标识符。该标识符可作为CSIRT事件处理或知识管理系统的索引。

contents.text: The combination of the name attribute and the string in the element content MUST be a globally unique identifier describing the activity. Documents generated by a given CSIRT MUST NOT reuse the same value unless they are referencing the same incident.
contents.zh-CHS: 元素内容中的name属性和字符串的组合必须是描述活动的全局唯一标识符。给定CSIRT生成的文档不得重用相同的值，除非它们引用相同的事件。

contents.text:
+------------------------+
| IncidentID             |
+------------------------+
| STRING                 |
|                        |
| STRING name            |
| STRING instance        |
| ENUM restriction       |
| STRING ext-restriction |
+------------------------+
Figure 7: The IncidentID Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图7：包含的类别

contents.text: The content of the class is an incident identifier of type STRING.
contents.zh-CHS: 类的内容是字符串类型的事件标识符。

contents.text: The attributes of the IncidentID class are:
contents.zh-CHS: IncidentID类的属性包括：

contents.text: name Required. STRING. An identifier describing the CSIRT that created the document. In order to have a globally unique CSIRT name, the fully qualified domain name associated with the CSIRT MUST be used.
contents.zh-CHS: 需要名称。一串描述创建文档的CSIRT的标识符。为了拥有全局唯一的CSIRT名称，必须使用与CSIRT关联的完全限定域名。

contents.text: instance Optional. STRING. An identifier referencing a subset of the named incident.
contents.zh-CHS: 实例可选。一串引用命名事件子集的标识符。

contents.text: restriction Optional. ENUM. See Section 3.3.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 限制是可选的。枚举。见第3.3.1节。

contents.text: ext-restriction Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the restriction attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 外部限制可选。一串扩展限制属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: 3.5. AlternativeID Class
contents.zh-CHS: 3.5. 交替类

contents.text: The AlternativeID class lists the tracking numbers used by CSIRTs, other than the one generating the document, to refer to the identical activity described in the IODEF document. A tracking number listed as an AlternativeID references the same incident detected by another CSIRT. The tracking numbers of the CSIRT that generated the IODEF document must never be considered an AlternativeID.
contents.zh-CHS: AlternativeID类列出CSIRT使用的跟踪号，而不是生成文档的跟踪号，以引用IODEF文档中描述的相同活动。列为备用ID的跟踪号引用另一个CSIRT检测到的相同事件。生成IODEF文档的CSIRT的跟踪号决不能被视为备选ID。

contents.text: Figure 8: The AlternativeID Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图8:AlternativeID类

contents.text: The aggregate class of the AlternativeID class is:
contents.zh-CHS: AlternativeID类的聚合类为：

contents.text: IncidentID One or more. The tracking number of another CSIRT. See Section 3.4.
contents.zh-CHS: 包含一个或多个。另一个CSIRT的跟踪号。见第3.4节。

contents.text: The attributes of the AlternativeID class are:
contents.zh-CHS: AlternativeID类的属性包括：

contents.text: restriction Optional. ENUM. See Section 3.3.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 限制是可选的。枚举。见第3.3.1节。

contents.text: ext-restriction Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the restriction attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 外部限制可选。一串扩展限制属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: 3.6. RelatedActivity Class
contents.zh-CHS: 3.6. 相关活动课

contents.text: The RelatedActivity class relates the information described in the rest of the document to previously observed incidents or activity and allows attribution to a specific actor or campaign.
contents.zh-CHS: RelatedActivity类将文档其余部分中描述的信息与以前观察到的事件或活动相关联，并允许将其归因于特定的参与者或活动。

contents.text: Figure 9: The RelatedActivity Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图9:RelatedActivity类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the RelatedActivity class are:
contents.zh-CHS: RelatedActivity类的聚合类为：

contents.text: IncidentID Zero or more. The tracking number of a related incident. See Section 3.4.
contents.zh-CHS: 包括零或更多。相关事件的跟踪编号。见第3.4节。

contents.text: URL Zero or more. URL. A URL to activity related to this incident.
contents.zh-CHS: URL为零或更多。网址。指向与此事件相关的活动的URL。

contents.text: ThreatActor Zero or more. The threat actor to whom the incident activity is attributed. See Section 3.7.
contents.zh-CHS: 威胁因子为零或更多。事件活动归因于的威胁参与者。见第3.7节。

contents.text: Campaign Zero or more. The campaign of a given threat actor to whom the described activity is attributed. See Section 3.8.
contents.zh-CHS: 活动零或更多。所述活动的特定威胁行为人的活动。见第3.8节。

contents.text: IndicatorID Zero or more. A reference to a related indicator. See Section 3.4.
contents.zh-CHS: 指示零或更多。对相关指标的引用。见第3.4节。

contents.text: Confidence Zero or one. An estimate of the confidence in attributing this RelatedActivity to the events described in the document. See Section 3.12.5.
contents.zh-CHS: 信心0或1。将此相关活动归因于文件中所述事件的置信度估计。见第3.12.5节。

contents.text: Description Zero or more. ML_STRING. A description of how these relationships were derived.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明零或更多。ML_字符串。这些关系是如何派生的描述。

contents.text: AdditionalData Zero or more. EXTENSION. A mechanism by which to extend the data model.
contents.zh-CHS: 附加数据为零或更多。扩大用于扩展数据模型的机制。

contents.text: The RelatedActivity class MUST have at least one instance of any of the following child classes: IncidentID, URL, ThreatActor, Campaign, Description, or AdditionalData.
contents.zh-CHS: RelatedActivity类必须至少具有以下任何子类的一个实例：IncidentID、URL、ThreatActor、Campaign、Description或AdditionalData。

contents.text: The attributes of the RelatedActivity class are:
contents.zh-CHS: RelatedActivity类的属性包括：

contents.text: restriction Optional. ENUM. See Section 3.3.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 限制是可选的。枚举。见第3.3.1节。

contents.text: ext-restriction Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the restriction attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 外部限制可选。一串扩展限制属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: 3.7. ThreatActor Class
contents.zh-CHS: 3.7. 威胁者类

contents.text: The ThreatActor class describes a threat actor.
contents.zh-CHS: ThreatActor类描述威胁参与者。

contents.text: Figure 10: The ThreatActor Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图10:ThreatActor类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the ThreatActor class are:
contents.zh-CHS: ThreatActor类的聚合类为：

contents.text: ThreatActorID Zero or more. STRING. An identifier for the threat actor.
contents.zh-CHS: ThreatActorID为零或更多。一串威胁参与者的标识符。

contents.text: URL Zero or more. URL. A URL to a reference describing the threat actor.
contents.zh-CHS: URL为零或更多。网址。描述威胁参与者的引用的URL。

contents.text: Description Zero or more. ML_STRING. A description of the threat actor.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明零或更多。ML_字符串。对威胁行为人的描述。

contents.text: AdditionalData Zero or more. EXTENSION. A mechanism by which to extend the data model.
contents.zh-CHS: 附加数据为零或更多。扩大用于扩展数据模型的机制。

contents.text: The ThreatActor class MUST have at least one instance of a child class.
contents.zh-CHS: ThreatActor类必须至少有一个子类的实例。

contents.text: The attributes of the ThreatActor class are:
contents.zh-CHS: ThreatActor类的属性包括：

contents.text: restriction Optional. ENUM. See Section 3.3.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 限制是可选的。枚举。见第3.3.1节。

contents.text: ext-restriction Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the restriction attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 外部限制可选。一串扩展限制属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: 3.8. Campaign Class
contents.zh-CHS: 3.8. 竞选班

contents.text: The Campaign class describes a campaign of attacks by a threat actor.
contents.zh-CHS: Campaign类描述威胁参与者的攻击活动。

contents.text: Figure 11: The Campaign Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图11:Campaign类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the Campaign class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 活动类的聚合类为：

contents.text: CampaignID Zero or more. STRING. An identifier for the campaign.
contents.zh-CHS: 活动ID为零或更多。一串活动的标识符。

contents.text: URL Zero or more. URL. A URL to a reference describing the campaign.
contents.zh-CHS: URL为零或更多。网址。描述活动的引用的URL。

contents.text: Description Zero or more. ML_STRING. A description of the campaign.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明零或更多。ML_字符串。对竞选活动的描述。

contents.text: AdditionalData Zero or more. EXTENSION. A mechanism by which to extend the data model.
contents.zh-CHS: 附加数据为零或更多。扩大用于扩展数据模型的机制。

contents.text: The Campaign class MUST have at least one instance of a child class.
contents.zh-CHS: 活动类必须至少有一个子类的实例。

contents.text: The attributes of the Campaign class are:
contents.zh-CHS: Campaign类的属性包括：

contents.text: restriction Optional. ENUM. See Section 3.3.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 限制是可选的。枚举。见第3.3.1节。

contents.text: ext-restriction Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the restriction attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 外部限制可选。一串扩展限制属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: 3.9. Contact Class
contents.zh-CHS: 3.9. 接触类

contents.text: The Contact class describes contact information for organizations and personnel involved in the incident. This class allows for the naming of the involved party, specifying contact information for them, and identifying their role in the incident.
contents.zh-CHS: Contact类描述了参与事件的组织和人员的联系信息。此类允许命名相关方，指定他们的联系信息，并确定他们在事件中的角色。

contents.text: People and organizations are treated interchangeably as contacts; one can be associated with the other using the recursive definition of the class (the Contact class is aggregated into the Contact class). The type attribute disambiguates the type of contact information being provided.
contents.zh-CHS: 人们和组织可以互换地被视为联系人；一个可以使用类的递归定义与另一个相关联（Contact类聚合到Contact类中）。type属性消除了所提供联系信息类型的歧义。

contents.text: The recursive definition of Contact provides a way to relate information without requiring the explicit use of identifiers or duplication of data. A complete point of contact is derived by a particular traversal from the root Contact class to the leaf Contact class. Each child Contact class logically inherits contact information from its ancestors.
contents.zh-CHS: 联系人的递归定义提供了一种关联信息的方法，无需明确使用标识符或重复数据。通过从根接触类到叶接触类的特定遍历，可以导出完整的接触点。每个子联系人类从逻辑上继承其祖先的联系人信息。

contents.text:
+------------------------+
| Contact                |
+------------------------+
| ENUM role              |<>--{0..*}--[ ContactName    ]
| STRING ext-role        |<>--{0..*}--[ ContactTitle   ]
| ENUM type              |<>--{0..*}--[ Description    ]
| STRING ext-type        |<>--{0..*}--[ RegistryHandle ]
| ENUM restriction       |<>--{0..*}--[ PostalAddress  ]
| STRING ext-restriction |<>--{0..*}--[ Email          ]
|                        |<>--{0..*}--[ Telephone      ]
|                        |<>--{0..1}--[ Timezone       ]
|                        |<>--{0..*}--[ Contact        ]
|                        |<>--{0..*}--[ AdditionalData ]
+------------------------+
Figure 12: The Contact Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图12:Contact类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the Contact class are:
contents.zh-CHS: Contact类别的聚合类别为：

contents.text: ContactName Zero or more. ML_STRING. The name of the contact. The contact may either be an organization or a person. The type attribute disambiguates the semantics.
contents.zh-CHS: ContactName为零或更多。ML_字符串。联系人的姓名。联系人可以是组织或个人。type属性消除了语义的歧义。

contents.text: ContactTitle Zero or more. ML_STRING. The title for the individual named in the ContactName.
contents.zh-CHS: ContactTitle零或更多。ML_字符串。ContactName中指定的个人的标题。

contents.text: Description Zero or more. ML_STRING. A free-form text description of the contact.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明零或更多。ML_字符串。联系人的自由格式文本描述。

contents.text: RegistryHandle Zero or more. A handle name into the registry of the contact. See Section 3.9.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 注册表句柄为零或更多。联系人注册表中的句柄名称。见第3.9.1节。

contents.text: PostalAddress Zero or more. The postal address of the contact. See Section 3.9.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 邮资为零或更多。联系人的邮政地址。见第3.9.2节。

contents.text: Email Zero or more. The email address of the contact. See Section 3.9.3.
contents.zh-CHS: 零封或多封电子邮件。联系人的电子邮件地址。见第3.9.3节。

contents.text: Telephone Zero or more. The telephone number of the contact. See Section 3.9.4.
contents.zh-CHS: 电话零或更多。联系人的电话号码。见第3.9.4节。

contents.text: Timezone Zero or one. TIMEZONE. The timezone in which the contact resides.
contents.zh-CHS: 时区0或1。时区。联系人所在的时区。

contents.text: Contact Zero or more. A recursive definition of the Contact class. This definition can be used to group common data pertaining to multiple points of contact and is especially useful when listing multiple contacts at the same organization.
contents.zh-CHS: 联系零或更多。Contact类的递归定义。此定义可用于对与多个联系人相关的公共数据进行分组，在列出同一组织中的多个联系人时尤其有用。

contents.text: AdditionalData Zero or more. EXTENSION. A mechanism by which to extend the data model.
contents.zh-CHS: 附加数据为零或更多。扩大用于扩展数据模型的机制。

contents.text: At least one of the aggregate classes MUST be present in an instance of the Contact class.
contents.zh-CHS: Contact类的实例中必须至少存在一个聚合类。

contents.text: The attributes of the Contact class are:
contents.zh-CHS: Contact类的属性包括：

contents.text: role Required. ENUM. Indicates the role the contact fulfills. These values are maintained in the "Contact-role" IANA registry per Section 10.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 角色要求。枚举。指示联系人履行的角色。根据第10.2节，这些值保存在“联系人角色”IANA注册表中。

contents.text: 1. creator. The entity that generates the document.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 造物主。生成文档的实体。

contents.text: 2. reporter. The entity that reported the information.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 记者报告信息的实体。

contents.text: 3. admin. An administrative contact or business owner for an asset or organization.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 管理资产或组织的管理联系人或业务所有者。

contents.text: 4. tech. An entity responsible for the day-to-day management of technical issues for an asset or organization.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 技术。负责资产或组织技术问题日常管理的实体。

contents.text: 5. provider. An external hosting provider for an asset.
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 供应商。资产的外部托管提供程序。

contents.text: 6. user. An end-user of an asset or part of an organization.
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 使用者资产或组织部分的最终用户。

contents.text: 7. billing. An entity responsible for billing issues for an asset or organization.
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 演员表负责资产或组织账单问题的实体。

contents.text: 8. legal. An entity responsible for legal issues related to an asset or organization.
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 合法的负责与资产或组织相关的法律问题的实体。

contents.text: 9. irt. An entity responsible for handling security issues for an asset or organization.
contents.zh-CHS: 9. irt。负责处理资产或组织安全问题的实体。

contents.text: 10. abuse. An entity responsible for handling abuse originating from an asset or organization.
contents.zh-CHS: 10. 滥用负责处理源自资产或组织的滥用行为的实体。

contents.text: 11. cc. An entity that is to be kept informed about the events related to an asset or organization.
contents.zh-CHS: 11. 复写的副本。与资产或组织相关的事件将被告知的实体。

contents.text: 12. cc-irt. A CSIRT or information-sharing organization coordinating activity related to an asset or organization.
contents.zh-CHS: 12. cc irt。协调资产或组织相关活动的CSIRT或信息共享组织。

contents.text: 13. leo. A law enforcement organization supporting the investigation of activity affecting an asset or organization.
contents.zh-CHS: 13. 狮子座。支持调查影响资产或组织的活动的执法组织。

contents.text: 14. vendor. The vendor that produces an asset.
contents.zh-CHS: 14. 小贩生产资产的供应商。

contents.text: 15. vendor-support. A vendor that provides services.
contents.zh-CHS: 15. 供应商支持。提供服务的供应商。

contents.text: 16. victim. A victim in the incident.
contents.zh-CHS: 16. 受害者事件中的受害者。

contents.text: 17. victim-notified. A victim in the incident who has been notified.
contents.zh-CHS: 17. 已通知受害者。事件中已被通知的受害者。

contents.text: 18. ext-value. A value used to indicate that this attribute is extended and the actual value is provided using the corresponding ext-* attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 18. 外部值。一个值，用于指示此属性已扩展，并使用相应的ext-*属性提供实际值。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: ext-role Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the role attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: ext角色可选。一串扩展角色属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: type Required. ENUM. Indicates the type of contact being described. This attribute is defined as an enumerated list. These values are maintained in the "Contact-type" IANA registry per Section 10.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 所需类型。枚举。指示正在描述的触点类型。此属性定义为枚举列表。根据第10.2节，这些值保存在“联系人类型”IANA注册表中。

contents.text: 1. person. The information for this contact references an individual.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 人此联系人的信息引用个人。

contents.text: 2. organization. The information for this contact references an organization.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 组织此联系人的信息引用了一个组织。

contents.text: 3. ext-value. A value used to indicate that this attribute is extended and the actual value is provided using the corresponding ext-* attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 外部值。一个值，用于指示此属性已扩展，并使用相应的ext-*属性提供实际值。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: ext-type Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the type attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: ext类型可选。一串扩展类型属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: restriction Optional. ENUM. See Section 3.3.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 限制是可选的。枚举。见第3.3.1节。

contents.text: ext-restriction Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the restriction attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 外部限制可选。一串扩展限制属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: 3.9.1. RegistryHandle Class
contents.zh-CHS: 3.9.1. 注册表句柄类

contents.text: The RegistryHandle class represents a handle into an Internet registry or community-specific database.
contents.zh-CHS: RegistryHandle类表示Internet注册表或社区特定数据库的句柄。

contents.text: Figure 13: The RegistryHandle Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图13:RegistryHandle类

contents.text: The content of the class is a handle into a registry of type STRING.
contents.zh-CHS: 类的内容是字符串类型注册表的句柄。

contents.text: The attributes of the RegistryHandle class are:
contents.zh-CHS: RegistryHandle类的属性包括：

contents.text: registry Required. ENUM. The database to which the handle belongs. These values are maintained in the "RegistryHandle-registry" IANA registry per Section 10.2. The possible values are:
contents.zh-CHS: 需要注册。枚举。句柄所属的数据库。根据第10.2节，这些值保存在“RegistryHandle注册表”IANA注册表中。可能的值为：

contents.text: 1. internic. Internet Network Information Center
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 国际。互联网信息中心

contents.text: 2. apnic. Asia Pacific Network Information Center
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 呼吸暂停。亚太网络信息中心

contents.text: 3. arin. American Registry for Internet Numbers
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 阿林。注册中心

contents.text: 4. lacnic. Latin American and Caribbean Internet Addresses Registry
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 拉尼克。拉丁美洲和加勒比因特网地址登记处

contents.text: 5. ripe. Reseaux IP Europeens
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 成熟的欧洲研究

contents.text: 6. afrinic. African Network Information Center
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 非洲的。非洲网络信息中心

contents.text: 7. local. A database local to the CSIRT
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 地方的CSIRT的本地数据库

contents.text: 8. ext-value. A value used to indicate that this attribute is extended and the actual value is provided using the corresponding ext-* attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 外部值。一个值，用于指示此属性已扩展，并使用相应的ext-*属性提供实际值。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: ext-registry Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the registry attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: ext注册表可选。一串扩展注册表属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: 3.9.2. PostalAddress Class
The PostalAddress class specifies a postal address and associated annotation.
contents.zh-CHS: PostalAddress类指定邮政地址和关联的批注。

contents.text: Figure 14: The PostalAddress Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图14：PostalAddress类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the PostalAddress class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 邮资类别的合计类别为：

contents.text: PAddress One. POSTAL. A postal address.
contents.zh-CHS: 一号围裙。邮政。邮政地址。

contents.text: Description Zero or more. ML_STRING. A free-form text description of the address.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明零或更多。ML_字符串。地址的自由格式文本描述。

contents.text: The attributes of the PostalAddress class are:
contents.zh-CHS: PostLadAddress类的属性包括：

contents.text: type Optional. ENUM. Categorizes the type of address described in the PAddress class. These values are maintained in the "PostalAddress-type" IANA registry per Section 10.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 类型可选。枚举。对PAddress类中描述的地址类型进行分类。根据第10.2节，这些值保存在“PostalAddress类型”IANA注册表中。

contents.text: 1. street. An address describing a physical location.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 大街描述物理位置的地址。

contents.text: 2. mailing. An address to which correspondence should be sent.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 邮寄。通信应该发送到的地址。

contents.text: 3. ext-value. A value used to indicate that this attribute is extended and the actual value is provided using the corresponding ext-* attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 外部值。一个值，用于指示此属性已扩展，并使用相应的ext-*属性提供实际值。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: ext-type Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the type attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: ext类型可选。一串扩展类型属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: 3.9.3. Email Class
contents.zh-CHS: 3.9.3. 电子邮件类

contents.text: The Email class specifies an email address and associated annotation.
contents.zh-CHS: 电子邮件类指定电子邮件地址和关联的批注。

contents.text: Figure 15: The Email Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图15:Email类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the Email class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 电子邮件类的聚合类为：

contents.text: EmailTo One. EMAIL. An email address.
contents.zh-CHS: 给一个发电子邮件。电子邮件电子邮件地址。

contents.text: Description Zero or more. ML_STRING. A free-form text description of the email address.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明零或更多。ML_字符串。电子邮件地址的自由格式文本描述。

contents.text: The attributes of the Email class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 电子邮件类的属性包括：

contents.text: type Optional. ENUM. Categorizes the type of email address described in the EmailTo class. These values are maintained in the "Email-type" IANA registry per Section 10.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 类型可选。枚举。对EmailTo类中描述的电子邮件地址类型进行分类。根据第10.2节，这些值保存在“电子邮件类型”IANA注册表中。

contents.text: 1. direct. An email address of an individual.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 直接的个人的电子邮件地址。

contents.text: 2. hotline. An email address regularly monitored for operational purposes.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 热线电话为操作目的而定期监控的电子邮件地址。

contents.text: 3. ext-value. A value used to indicate that this attribute is extended and the actual value is provided using the corresponding ext-* attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 外部值。一个值，用于指示此属性已扩展，并使用相应的ext-*属性提供实际值。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: ext-type Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the type attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: ext类型可选。一串扩展类型属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: 3.9.4. Telephone Class
The Telephone class describes a telephone number and associated annotation.
contents.zh-CHS: 电话类描述电话号码和相关注释。

contents.text: Figure 16: The Telephone Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图16：电话类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the Telephone class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 电话类的聚合类为：

contents.text: TelephoneNumber One. PHONE. A telephone number.
contents.zh-CHS: 一号电话。电话电话号码。

contents.text: Description Zero or more. ML_STRING. A free-form text description of the phone number.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明零或更多。ML_字符串。电话号码的自由格式文本说明。

contents.text: The attributes of the Telephone class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 电话类的属性包括：

contents.text: type Optional. ENUM. Categorizes the type of telephone number described in the TelephoneNumber class. These values are maintained in the "Telephone-type" IANA registry per Section 10.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 类型可选。枚举。对电话号码类中描述的电话号码类型进行分类。根据第10.2节，这些值保存在“电话类型”IANA注册表中。

contents.text: 1. wired. A number of a wire-line (land-line) phone.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 有线。有线（陆地线）电话的号码。

contents.text: 2. mobile. A number of a mobile phone.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 可移动的移动电话的号码。

contents.text: 3. fax. A number to a fax machine.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 传真传真机的号码。

contents.text: 4. hotline. A number to a regularly monitored operational hotline.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 热线电话定期监控运营热线的号码。

contents.text: 5. ext-value. A value used to indicate that this attribute is extended and the actual value is provided using the corresponding ext-* attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 外部值。一个值，用于指示此属性已扩展，并使用相应的ext-*属性提供实际值。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: ext-type Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the type attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: ext类型可选。一串扩展类型属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: 3.10. Discovery Class
The Discovery class describes how an incident was detected.
contents.zh-CHS: 发现类描述如何检测事件。

contents.text:
+------------------------+
| Discovery              |
+------------------------+
| ENUM source            |<>--{0..*}--[ Description      ]
| STRING ext-source      |<>--{0..*}--[ Contact          ]
| ENUM restriction       |<>--{0..*}--[ DetectionPattern ]
| STRING ext-restriction |
+------------------------+
Figure 17: The Discovery Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图17：发现类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the Discovery class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 发现类的聚合类包括：

contents.text: Description Zero or more. ML_STRING. A free-form text description of how this incident was detected.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明零或更多。ML_字符串。关于如何检测此事件的自由格式文本描述。

contents.text: Contact Zero or more. Contact information for the party that discovered the incident. See Section 3.9.
contents.zh-CHS: 联系零或更多。事件发现方的联系信息。见第3.9节。

contents.text: DetectionPattern Zero or more. Describes an application-specific configuration that detected the incident. See Section 3.10.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 检测模式为零或更多。描述检测到事件的特定于应用程序的配置。见第3.10.1节。

contents.text: The attributes of the Discovery class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 发现类的属性包括：

contents.text: source Optional. ENUM. Categorizes the techniques used to discover the incident. These values are partially derived from Table 3-1 of [NIST800.61rev2]. These values are maintained in the "Discovery-source" IANA registry per Section 10.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 源可选。枚举。对用于发现事件的技术进行分类。这些值部分源自[NIST800.61rev2]的表3-1。根据第10.2节，这些值保存在“发现源”IANA注册表中。

contents.text: 1. nidps. Network Intrusion Detection or Prevention System.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. nidps。网络入侵检测或预防系统。

contents.text: 2. hips. Host-based Intrusion Prevention System.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 臀部。基于主机的入侵防御系统。

contents.text: 3. siem. Security Information and Event Management System.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 暹罗。安全信息和事件管理系统。

contents.text: 4. av. Antivirus or antispam software.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. av。防病毒或反垃圾邮件软件。

contents.text: 5. third-party-monitoring. Contracted third-party monitoring service.
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 第三方监测。签约的第三方监控服务。

contents.text: 6. incident. The activity was discovered while investigating an unrelated incident.
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 发生的事情该活动是在调查一个无关事件时发现的。

contents.text: 7. os-log. Operating system logs.
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 操作系统日志。操作系统日志。

contents.text: 8. application-log. Application logs.
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 应用程序日志。应用程序日志。

contents.text: 9. device-log. Network device logs.
contents.zh-CHS: 9. 设备日志。网络设备日志。

contents.text: 10. network-flow. Network flow analysis.
contents.zh-CHS: 10. 网络流量。网络流分析。

contents.text: 11. passive-dns. Passive DNS analysis.
contents.zh-CHS: 11. 被动dns。被动DNS分析。

contents.text: 12. investigation. Manual investigation initiated based on notification of a new vulnerability or exploit.
contents.zh-CHS: 12. 调查根据新漏洞或漏洞的通知启动手动调查。

contents.text: 13. audit. Security audit.
contents.zh-CHS: 13. 审计安全审计。

contents.text: 14. internal-notification. A party within the organization reported the activity.
contents.zh-CHS: 14. 内部通知。该组织内的一个缔约方报告了该活动。

contents.text: 15. external-notification. A party outside of the organization reported the activity.
contents.zh-CHS: 15. 外部通知。该组织以外的一方报告了该活动。

contents.text: 16. leo. A law enforcement organization notified the victim organization.
contents.zh-CHS: 16. 狮子座。一个执法组织通知了受害者组织。

contents.text: 17. partner. A customer or business partner reported the activity to the victim organization.
contents.zh-CHS: 17. 配偶客户或业务合作伙伴向受害组织报告了该活动。

contents.text: 18. actor. The threat actor directly or indirectly reported this activity to the victim organization.
contents.zh-CHS: 18. 演员威胁行为人直接或间接向受害者组织报告了这一活动。

contents.text: 19. unknown. Unknown detection approach.
contents.zh-CHS: 19. 未知的未知检测方法。

contents.text: 20. ext-value. A value used to indicate that this attribute is extended and the actual value is provided using the corresponding ext-* attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 20. 外部值。一个值，用于指示此属性已扩展，并使用相应的ext-*属性提供实际值。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: ext-source Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the source attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: ext源代码可选。一串扩展源属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: restriction Optional. ENUM. See Section 3.3.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 限制是可选的。枚举。见第3.3.1节。

contents.text: ext-restriction Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the restriction attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 外部限制可选。一串扩展限制属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: 3.10.1. DetectionPattern Class
contents.zh-CHS: 3.10.1. 检测模式类

contents.text: The DetectionPattern class describes a configuration or signature that can be used by an Intrusion Detection System (IDS) / Intrusion Prevention System (IPS), SIEM, antivirus, endpoint protection, network analysis, malware analysis, or host forensics tool to identify a particular phenomenon. This class requires the identification of the target application and allows the configuration to be described in either free form or machine-readable form.
contents.zh-CHS: DetectionPattern类描述入侵检测系统（IDS）/入侵预防系统（IPS）、SIEM、防病毒、端点保护、网络分析、恶意软件分析或主机取证工具可用于识别特定现象的配置或签名。此类需要识别目标应用程序，并允许以自由形式或机器可读形式描述配置。

contents.text:
+------------------------+
| DetectionPattern       |
+------------------------+
| ENUM restriction       |<>----------[ Application            ]
| STRING ext-restriction |<>--{0..*}--[ Description            ]
| ID observable-id       |<>--{0..*}--[ DetectionConfiguration ]
+------------------------+
Figure 18: The DetectionPattern Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图18:DetectionPattern类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the DetectionPattern class are:
contents.zh-CHS: DetectionPattern类的聚合类为：

contents.text: Application One. SOFTWARE. The application for which the DetectionConfiguration or Description is being provided.
contents.zh-CHS: 应用程序一。软件为其提供检测配置或描述的应用程序。

contents.text: Description Zero or more. ML_STRING. A free-form text description of how to use the information provided in the Application or DetectionConfiguration classes.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明零或更多。ML_字符串。关于如何使用Application或DetectionConfiguration类中提供的信息的自由格式文本说明。

contents.text: DetectionConfiguration Zero or more. STRING. A machine-consumable configuration to find a pattern of activity.
contents.zh-CHS: 检测配置为零或更多。一串用于查找活动模式的机器耗材配置。

contents.text: An instance of either the Description or DetectionConfiguration class MUST be present.
contents.zh-CHS: 必须存在Description或DetectionConfiguration类的实例。

contents.text: The attributes of the DetectionPattern class are:
contents.zh-CHS: DetectionPattern类的属性包括：

contents.text: restriction Optional. ENUM. See Section 3.3.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 限制是可选的。枚举。见第3.3.1节。

contents.text: ext-restriction Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the restriction attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 外部限制可选。一串扩展限制属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: observable-id Optional. ID. See Section 3.3.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 可观察id可选。ID.见第3.3.2节。

contents.text: 3.11. Method Class

The Method class describes the tactics, techniques, procedures, or weakness used by the threat actor in an incident. This class consists of both a list of references describing the attack methods and weaknesses and a free-form text description.
contents.zh-CHS: Method类描述威胁参与者在事件中使用的战术、技术、过程或弱点。此类由描述攻击方法和弱点的引用列表和自由格式的文本描述组成。

contents.text: Figure 19: The Method Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图19：方法类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the Method class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 方法类的聚合类为：
