contents.zh-CHS: ApplicationHeaderField一个或多个。扩大协议头中的字段名和值。name属性必须设置为字段名。必须在元素内容中设置字段值。

contents.text: The ApplicationHeader class has no attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: ApplicationHeader类没有属性。

contents.text: 3.21. EmailData Class
contents.zh-CHS: 3.21. EmailData类

contents.text: The EmailData class describes headers from an email message and cryptographic hashes and signatures applied to it.
contents.zh-CHS: EmailData类描述电子邮件消息的标题以及应用于其的加密哈希和签名。

contents.text: Figure 44: EmailData Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图44:EmailData类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the EmailData class are:
contents.zh-CHS: EmailData类的聚合类包括：

contents.text: EmailTo Zero or more. EMAIL. The value of the "To:" header field (Section 3.6.3 of [RFC5322]) in an email.
contents.zh-CHS: 电子邮件发送到零或更多。电子邮件电子邮件中“收件人：”标题字段（RFC5322的第3.6.3节）的值。

contents.text: EmailFrom Zero or one. EMAIL. The value of the "From:" header field (Section 3.6.2 of [RFC5322]) in an email.
contents.zh-CHS: 从零到一发电子邮件。电子邮件电子邮件中“发件人：”标题字段（RFC5322的第3.6.2节）的值。

contents.text: EmailSubject Zero or one. STRING. The value of the "Subject:" header field in an email. See Section 3.6.5 of [RFC5322].
contents.zh-CHS: 电子邮件主题0或1。一串电子邮件中“主题：”标题字段的值。见[RFC5322]第3.6.5节。

contents.text: EmailX-Mailer Zero or one. STRING. The value of the "X-Mailer:" header field in an email.
contents.zh-CHS: EmailX-Mailer零或一。一串电子邮件中“X-Mailer:”标题字段的值。

contents.text: EmailHeaderField Zero or more. EXTENSION. The header name and value of an arbitrary header field of the email message. The name attribute MUST be set to the header name. The header value MUST be set in the element body. The dtype attribute MUST be set to "string".
contents.zh-CHS: EmailHeaderField零或更多。扩大电子邮件任意标题字段的标题名称和值。“名称”属性必须设置为标题名称。必须在元素主体中设置标题值。数据类型属性必须设置为“字符串”。

contents.text: EmailHeaders Zero or one. STRING. The headers of an email message.
contents.zh-CHS: 电子邮件头零或一。一串电子邮件的标题。

contents.text: EmailBody Zero or one. STRING. The body of an email message.
contents.zh-CHS: 电子邮件正文0或1。一串电子邮件的正文。

contents.text: EmailMessage Zero or one. STRING. The headers and body of an email message.
contents.zh-CHS: 电子邮件0或1。一串电子邮件的标题和正文。

contents.text: HashData Zero or more. Hash(es) associated with this email message. See Section 3.26.
contents.zh-CHS: 哈希数据为零或更多。与此电子邮件关联的哈希。见第3.26节。

contents.text: SignatureData Zero or more. Signature(s) associated with this email message. See Section 3.27.
contents.zh-CHS: 签名数据为零或更多。与此电子邮件关联的签名。见第3.27节。

contents.text: The attribute of the EmailData class is:
contents.zh-CHS: EmailData类的属性是：

contents.text: observable-id Optional. ID. See Section 3.3.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 可观察id可选。ID.见第3.3.2节。

contents.text: 3.22. Record Class

The Record class is a container class for log and audit data that provides supportive information about the events in an incident. The source of this data will often be the output of monitoring tools. These logs substantiate the activity described in the document.
contents.zh-CHS: Record类是日志和审核数据的容器类，它提供有关事件中事件的支持性信息。这些数据的来源通常是监控工具的输出。这些日志证实了文件中描述的活动。

contents.text: Figure 45: The Record Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图45：记录类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the Record class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 记录类的聚合类为：

contents.text: RecordData One or more. Log or audit data generated by a particular tool. Separate instances of the RecordData class SHOULD be used for each type of log. See Section 3.22.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 记录一个或多个数据。由特定工具生成的日志或审核数据。对于每种类型的日志，应使用RecordData类的单独实例。见第3.22.1节。

contents.text: The attributes of the Record class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 记录类的属性包括：

contents.text: restriction Optional. ENUM. See Section 3.3.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 限制是可选的。枚举。见第3.3.1节。

contents.text: ext-restriction Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the restriction attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 外部限制可选。一串扩展限制属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: 3.22.1. RecordData Class
contents.zh-CHS: 3.22.1. 记录数据类

contents.text: The RecordData class describes or references log or audit data from a given type of tool and provides a means to annotate the output.
contents.zh-CHS: RecordData类描述或引用来自给定类型工具的日志或审核数据，并提供对输出进行注释的方法。

contents.text:
+------------------------+
| RecordData             |
+------------------------+
| ENUM restriction       |<>--{0..1}--[ DateTime               ]
| STRING ext-restriction |<>--{0..*}--[ Description            ]
| ID observable-id       |<>--{0..1}--[ Application            ]
|                        |<>--{0..*}--[ RecordPattern          ]
|                        |<>--{0..*}--[ RecordItem             ]
|                        |<>--{0..*}--[ URL                    ]
|                        |<>--{0..*}--[ FileData               ]
|                        |<>--{0..*}--
|                        |       [ WindowsRegistryKeysModified ]
|                        |<>--{0..*}--[ CertificateData        ]
|                        |<>--{0..*}--[ AdditionalData         ]
+------------------------+
Figure 46: The RecordData Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图46:RecordData类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the RecordData class are:
contents.zh-CHS: RecordData类的聚合类包括：

contents.text: DateTime Zero or one. DATETIME. A timestamp of the data found in the RecordItem or URL classes.
contents.zh-CHS: 日期时间0或1。日期时间。在RecordItem或URL类中找到的数据的时间戳。

contents.text: Description Zero or more. ML_STRING. A free-form text description of the data provided in the RecordItem or URL classes.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明零或更多。ML_字符串。RecordItem或URL类中提供的数据的自由格式文本描述。

contents.text: Application Zero or one. SOFTWARE. Identifies the tool used to generate the data in the RecordItem or URL classes.
contents.zh-CHS: 应用程序0或1。软件标识用于在RecordItem或URL类中生成数据的工具。

contents.text: RecordPattern Zero or more. A search string to precisely find the relevant data in the RecordItem or URL classes. See Section 3.22.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 记录模式为零或更多。用于在RecordItem或URL类中精确查找相关数据的搜索字符串。见第3.22.2节。

contents.text: RecordItem Zero or more. EXTENSION. Log, audit, or forensic data to support the conclusions made during the course of analyzing the incident.
contents.zh-CHS: 记录项为零或更多。扩大记录、审计或法医数据，以支持在分析事件过程中得出的结论。

contents.text: URL Zero or more. URL. A URL reference to a log or audit data.
contents.zh-CHS: URL为零或更多。网址。日志或审核数据的URL引用。

contents.text: FileData Zero or one. The files involved in the incident. See Section 3.25.
contents.zh-CHS: 文件数据为零或一。事件涉及的档案。见第3.25节。

contents.text: WindowsRegistryKeysModified Zero or more. The registry keys that were involved in the incident. See Section 3.23.
contents.zh-CHS: WindowsRegistryKeysModified为零或更多。事件中涉及的注册表项。见第3.23节。

contents.text: CertificateData Zero or more. The certificates that were involved in the incident. See Section 3.24.
contents.zh-CHS: 认证数据为零或更多。与事件有关的证书。见第3.24节。

contents.text: AdditionalData Zero or more. EXTENSION. An extension mechanism for data not explicitly represented in the data model.
contents.zh-CHS: 附加数据为零或更多。扩大数据模型中未显式表示的数据的扩展机制。

contents.text: At least one of the following classes MUST be present: RecordItem, URL, FileData, WindowsRegistryKeysModified, CertificateData, or AdditionalData.
contents.zh-CHS: 必须至少存在以下类别之一：RecordItem、URL、FileData、WindowsRegistryKeysModified、CertificateData或AdditionalData。

contents.text: The attributes of the RecordData class are:
contents.zh-CHS: RecordData类的属性包括：

contents.text: restriction Optional. ENUM. See Section 3.3.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 限制是可选的。枚举。见第3.3.1节。

contents.text: ext-restriction Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the restriction attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 外部限制可选。一串扩展限制属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: observable-id Optional. ID. See Section 3.3.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 可观察id可选。ID.见第3.3.2节。

contents.text: 3.22.2. RecordPattern Class
contents.zh-CHS: 3.22.2. 记录模式类

contents.text: The RecordPattern class describes where in the log data provided or referenced in the RecordData class relevant information can be found. It provides a way to reference subsets of information, identified by a pattern, in a large log file, audit trail, or forensic data.
contents.zh-CHS: RecordPattern类描述了在RecordData类中提供或引用的日志数据中可以找到相关信息的位置。它提供了一种在大型日志文件、审计跟踪或取证数据中引用由模式标识的信息子集的方法。

contents.text:
+-----------------------+
| RecordPattern         |
+-----------------------+
| STRING                |
|                       |
| ENUM type             |
| STRING ext-type       |
| INTEGER offset        |
| ENUM offsetunit       |
| STRING ext-offsetunit |
| INTEGER instance      |
+-----------------------+
Figure 47: The RecordPattern Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图47:RecordPattern类

contents.text: The content of the class is of type STRING and specifies a search pattern.
contents.zh-CHS: 类的内容为STRING类型，并指定搜索模式。

contents.text: The attributes of the RecordPattern class are:
contents.zh-CHS: RecordPattern类的属性包括：

contents.text: type Required. ENUM. Describes the type of pattern being specified in the element content. The default is "regex". These values are maintained in the "RecordPattern-type" IANA registry per Section 10.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 所需类型。枚举。描述元素内容中指定的模式类型。默认值为“regex”。根据第10.2节，这些值保存在“RecordPattern type”IANA注册表中。

contents.text: 1. regex. Regular expression as defined by POSIX Extended Regular Expressions (ERE) in Chapter 9 of [IEEE.POSIX].
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 正则表达式。[IEEE.POSIX]第9章中POSIX扩展正则表达式（ERE）定义的正则表达式。

contents.text: 2. binary. Binhex-encoded binary pattern, per the HEXBIN data type.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 二进制的Binhex编码的二进制模式，根据HEXBIN数据类型。

contents.text: 3. xpath. XML Path (XPath) [W3C.XPATH].
contents.zh-CHS: 3. xpath。XML路径（XPath）[W3C.XPath]。

contents.text: 4. ext-value. A value used to indicate that this attribute is extended and the actual value is provided using the corresponding ext-* attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 外部值。一个值，用于指示此属性已扩展，并使用相应的ext-*属性提供实际值。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: ext-type Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the type attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: ext类型可选。一串扩展类型属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: offset Optional. INTEGER. Amount of units (determined by the offsetunit attribute) to seek into the RecordItem data before matching the pattern.
contents.zh-CHS: 偏移量可选。整数匹配模式之前要查找记录项数据的单位数（由offsetunit属性确定）。

contents.text: offsetunit Optional. ENUM. Describes the units of the offset attribute. The default is "line". These values are maintained in the "RecordPattern-offsetunit" IANA registry per Section 10.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 抵销单位可选。枚举。描述“偏移”属性的单位。默认值为“行”。根据第10.2节，这些值保存在“RecordPattern offsetunit”IANA注册表中。

contents.text: 1. line. Offset is a count of lines.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 线偏移量是行数。

contents.text: 2. byte. Offset is a count of bytes.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 字节偏移量是字节数。

contents.text: 3. ext-value. A value used to indicate that this attribute is extended and the actual value is provided using the corresponding ext-* attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 外部值。一个值，用于指示此属性已扩展，并使用相应的ext-*属性提供实际值。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: ext-offsetunit Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the offsetunit attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: ext offsetunit可选。一串扩展offsetunit属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: instance Optional. INTEGER. Number of times to apply the specified pattern.
contents.zh-CHS: 实例可选。整数应用指定图案的次数。

contents.text: 3.23. WindowsRegistryKeysModified Class
contents.zh-CHS: 3.23. WindowsRegistryKeysModified类

contents.text: The WindowsRegistryKeysModified class describes Windows operating system registry keys and the operations that were performed on them. This class was derived from [RFC5901].
contents.zh-CHS: WindowsRegistryKeysModified类描述Windows操作系统注册表项以及对其执行的操作。该类派生自[RFC5901]。

contents.text: Figure 48: The WindowsRegistryKeysModified Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图48:WindowsRegistryKeysModified类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the WindowsRegistryKeysModified class are:
contents.zh-CHS: WindowsRegistryKeysModified类的聚合类为：

contents.text: Key One or more. The Windows registry key. See Section 3.23.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 键入一个或多个。Windows注册表项。见第3.23.1节。

contents.text: The attribute of the WindowsRegistryKeysModified class is:
contents.zh-CHS: WindowsRegistryKeysModified类的属性为：

contents.text: observable-id Optional. ID. See Section 3.3.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 可观察id可选。ID.见第3.3.2节。

contents.text: 3.23.1. Key Class
The Key class describes a Windows operating system registry key name and value pair, as well as the operation performed on it.
contents.zh-CHS: Key类描述Windows操作系统注册表项名称和值对，以及对其执行的操作。

contents.text: Figure 49: The Key Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图49：关键类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the Key class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 密钥类的聚合类为：

contents.text: KeyName One. STRING. The name of a Windows operating system registry key (e.g., [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Test\KeyName]).
contents.zh-CHS: 关键字1。一串Windows操作系统注册表项的名称（例如，[HKEY\U LOCAL\U MACHINE\Software\Test\KeyName]）。

contents.text: KeyValue Zero or one. STRING. The value of the registry key identified in the KeyName class encoded per the .reg file format [KB310516].
contents.zh-CHS: 键值为0或1。一串按照.reg文件格式[KB310516]编码的KeyName类中标识的注册表项的值。

contents.text: The attributes of the Key class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 密钥类的属性包括：

contents.text: registryaction Optional. ENUM. The type of action taken on the registry key. These values are maintained in the "Key-registryaction" IANA registry per Section 10.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 注册表操作可选。枚举。对注册表项执行的操作类型。根据第10.2节，这些值保存在“Key registryaction”IANA注册表中。

contents.text: 1. add-key. Registry key added.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 添加密钥。添加了注册表项。

contents.text: 2. add-value. Value added to a registry key.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 增加价值。添加到注册表项的值。

contents.text: 3. delete-key. Registry key deleted.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 删除键。注册表项已删除。

contents.text: 4. delete-value. Value deleted from a registry key.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 删除值。从注册表项中删除的值。

contents.text: 5. modify-key. Registry key modified.
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 修改键。注册表项已修改。

contents.text: 6. modify-value. Value modified in a registry key.
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 修改值。在注册表项中修改的值。

contents.text: 7. ext-value. A value used to indicate that this attribute is extended and the actual value is provided using the corresponding ext-* attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 外部值。一个值，用于指示此属性已扩展，并使用相应的ext-*属性提供实际值。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: ext-registryaction Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the registryaction attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: ext registryaction可选。一串扩展registryaction属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: observable-id Optional. ID. See Section 3.3.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 可观察id可选。ID.见第3.3.2节。

contents.text: 3.24. CertificateData Class
contents.zh-CHS: 3.24. 认证数据类

contents.text: The CertificateData class describes X.509 certificates.
contents.zh-CHS: CertificateData类描述X.509证书。

contents.text:
+------------------------+
| CertificateData        |
+------------------------+
| ENUM restriction       |<>--{1..*}--[ Certificate    ]
| STRING ext-restriction |
| ID observable-id       |
+------------------------+
Figure 50: The CertificateData Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图50:CertificateData类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the CertificateData class are:
contents.zh-CHS: CertificateData类别的合计类别为：

contents.text: Certificate One or more. A description of an X.509 certificate or certificate chain. See Section 3.24.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 一个或多个证书。X.509证书或证书链的说明。见第3.24.1节。

contents.text: The attributes of the CertificateData class are:
contents.zh-CHS: CertificateData类的属性包括：

contents.text: restriction Optional. ENUM. See Section 3.3.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 限制是可选的。枚举。见第3.3.1节。

contents.text: ext-restriction Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the restriction attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 外部限制可选。一串扩展限制属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: observable-id Optional. ID. See Section 3.3.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 可观察id可选。ID.见第3.3.2节。

contents.text: 3.24.1. Certificate Class
The Certificate class describes a given X.509 certificate or certificate chain.
contents.zh-CHS: Certificate类描述给定的X.509证书或证书链。

contents.text: Figure 51: The Certificate Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图51：证书类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the Certificate class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 证书类的聚合类为：

contents.text: ds:X509Data One. A given X.509 certificate or chain. See Section 4.4.4 of [W3C.XMLSIG].
contents.zh-CHS: ds:X509数据一。给定的X.509证书或链。参见[W3C.XMLSIG]第4.4.4节。

contents.text: Description Zero or more. ML_STRING. A free-form text description explaining the context of this certificate.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明零或更多。ML_字符串。解释本证书上下文的自由格式文本说明。

contents.text: The attributes of the Certificate class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 证书类的属性包括：

contents.text: observable-id Optional. ID. See Section 3.3.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 可观察id可选。ID.见第3.3.2节。

contents.text: 3.25. FileData Class
contents.zh-CHS: 3.25. 文件数据类

contents.text: The FileData class describes a file or set of files.
contents.zh-CHS: FileData类描述一个文件或一组文件。

contents.text: Figure 52: The FileData Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图52:FileData类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the FileData class are:
contents.zh-CHS: FileData类的聚合类包括：

contents.text: File One or more. A description of a file. See Section 3.25.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 提交一个或多个文件。对文件的描述。见第3.25.1节。

contents.text: The attributes of the FileData class are:
contents.zh-CHS: FileData类的属性包括：

contents.text: restriction Optional. ENUM. See Section 3.3.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 限制是可选的。枚举。见第3.3.1节。

contents.text: ext-restriction Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the restriction attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 外部限制可选。一串扩展限制属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: observable-id Optional. ID. See Section 3.3.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 可观察id可选。ID.见第3.3.2节。

contents.text: 3.25.1. File Class
The File class describes a file; its associated metadata; and cryptographic hashes and signatures applied to it.
contents.zh-CHS: File类描述一个文件；其相关元数据；以及应用于它的加密散列和签名。

contents.text: Figure 53: The File Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图53：文件类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the File class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 文件类的聚合类包括：

contents.text: FileName Zero or one. STRING. The name of the file.
contents.zh-CHS: 文件名为零或一。一串文件名。

contents.text: FileSize Zero or one. INTEGER. The size of the file in bytes.
contents.zh-CHS: 文件大小为零或一。整数文件的大小（以字节为单位）。

contents.text: FileType Zero or one. STRING. The type of file per the IANA "Media Types" registry [IANA.Media]. Valid values correspond to the text in the "Template" column (e.g., "application/pdf").
contents.zh-CHS: 文件类型为零或一。一串IANA“媒体类型”注册表[IANA.Media]中的文件类型。有效值对应于“模板”列中的文本（例如，“应用程序/pdf”）。

contents.text: URL Zero or more. URL. A URL reference to the file.
contents.zh-CHS: URL为零或更多。网址。文件的URL引用。

contents.text: HashData Zero or one. Hash(es) associated with this file. See Section 3.26.
contents.zh-CHS: 哈希数据为0或1。与此文件关联的哈希。见第3.26节。

contents.text: SignatureData Zero or one. Signature(s) associated with this file. See Section 3.27.
contents.zh-CHS: 签名为零或一。与此文件关联的签名。见第3.27节。

contents.text: AssociatedSoftware Zero or one. SOFTWARE. The software application or operating system to which this file belongs or by which it can be processed.
contents.zh-CHS: 关联软件0或1。软件此文件所属或可用于处理此文件的软件应用程序或操作系统。

contents.text: FileProperties Zero or more. EXTENSION. Mechanism by which to extend the data model to describe properties of the file.
contents.zh-CHS: 文件属性为零或更多。扩大扩展数据模型以描述文件属性的机制。

contents.text: The attributes of the File class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 文件类的属性包括：

contents.text: observable-id Optional. ID. See Section 3.3.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 可观察id可选。ID.见第3.3.2节。

contents.text: 3.26. HashData Class
contents.zh-CHS: 3.26. HashData类

contents.text: The HashData class describes different types of hashes on a given object (e.g., file, part of a file, email).
contents.zh-CHS: HashData类描述给定对象（例如，文件、文件的一部分、电子邮件）上不同类型的哈希。

contents.text: Figure 54: The HashData Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图54:HashData类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the HashData class are:
contents.zh-CHS: HashData类的聚合类包括：

contents.text: HashTargetID Zero or one. STRING. An identifier that references a subset of the object being hashed. The semantics of this identifier are specified by the scope attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: HashTargetID为0或1。一串引用正在散列的对象子集的标识符。此标识符的语义由scope属性指定。

contents.text: Hash Zero or more. The hash of an object. See Section 3.26.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 散列为零或更多。对象的散列。见第3.26.1节。

contents.text: FuzzyHash Zero or more. The fuzzy hash of an object. See Section 3.26.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 模糊值为零或更多。对象的模糊散列。见第3.26.2节。

contents.text: At least one instance of either Hash or FuzzyHash MUST be present.
contents.zh-CHS: 必须至少存在哈希或FuzzyHash的一个实例。

contents.text: The attribute of the HashData class is:
contents.zh-CHS: HashData类的属性是：

contents.text: scope Required. ENUM. Describes on which part of the object the hash should be applied. These values are maintained in the "HashData-scope" IANA registry per Section 10.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 所需范围。枚举。描述应在对象的哪个部分应用哈希。根据第10.2节，这些值保存在“HashData范围”IANA注册表中。

contents.text: 1. file-contents. A hash computed over the entire contents of a file.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 文件内容。对文件的全部内容进行计算的散列。

contents.text: 2. file-pe-section. A hash computed on a given section of a Windows Portable Executable (PE) file. If set to this value, the HashTargetID class MUST identify the section being hashed. A section is identified by an ordinal number (starting at 1) corresponding to the order in which the given section header was defined in the Section Table of the PE file header.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 文件pe部分。在Windows可移植可执行文件（PE）的给定部分上计算的哈希值。如果设置为该值，HashTargetID类必须标识要散列的节。节由序号（从1开始）标识，序号对应于PE文件头的节表中定义给定节头的顺序。

contents.text: 3. file-pe-iat. A hash computed on the Import Address Table (IAT) of a PE file. As IAT hashes are often tool dependent, if this value is set, the Application class of either the Hash or FuzzyHash classes MUST specify the tool used to generate the hash.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 文件pe iat。在PE文件的导入地址表（IAT）上计算的哈希。由于IAT哈希通常依赖于工具，如果设置了此值，则哈希或FuzzyHash类的应用程序类必须指定用于生成哈希的工具。

contents.text: 4. file-pe-resource. A hash computed on a given resource in a PE file. If set to this value, the HashTargetID class MUST identify the resource being hashed. A resource is identified by an ordinal number (starting at 1) corresponding to the order in which the given resource is declared in the Resource Directory of the Data Dictionary in the PE file header.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 文件pe资源。对PE文件中给定资源计算的哈希。如果设置为该值，HashTargetID类必须标识正在散列的资源。资源由序号（从1开始）标识，该序号对应于PE文件头中数据字典的资源目录中声明给定资源的顺序。

contents.text: 5. file-pdf-object. A hash computed on a given object in a Portable Document Format (PDF) file. If set to this value, the HashTargetID class MUST identify the object being hashed. This object is identified by its offset in the PDF file.
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 文件pdf对象。在可移植文档格式（PDF）文件中对给定对象计算的哈希。如果设置为该值，HashTargetID类必须标识要散列的对象。此对象由其在PDF文件中的偏移量标识。

contents.text: 6. email-hash. A hash computed over the headers and body of an email message.
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 电子邮件散列。在电子邮件的标题和正文上计算的哈希。

contents.text: 7. email-headers-hash. A hash computed over all of the headers of an email message.
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 电子邮件标题散列。在电子邮件的所有标题上计算的哈希。

contents.text: 8. email-body-hash. A hash computed over the body of an email message.
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 电子邮件正文散列。在电子邮件正文上计算的哈希。

contents.text: 9. ext-value. A value used to indicate that this attribute is extended and the actual value is provided using the corresponding ext-* attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 9. 外部值。一个值，用于指示此属性已扩展，并使用相应的ext-*属性提供实际值。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: ext-scope Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the scope attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 外部作用域可选。一串扩展scope属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: 3.26.1. Hash Class
The Hash class describes a cryptographic hash value; the algorithm and application used to generate it; and the canonicalization method applied to the object being hashed.
contents.zh-CHS: 哈希类描述加密哈希值；用于生成它的算法和应用程序；以及应用于被散列对象的规范化方法。

contents.text: Figure 55: The Hash Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图55：散列类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the Hash class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 哈希类的聚合类是：

contents.text: ds:DigestMethod One. The hash algorithm used to generate the hash. See Section 4.3.3.5 of [W3C.XMLSIG].
contents.zh-CHS: ds：方法一。用于生成哈希的哈希算法。参见[W3C.XMLSIG]第4.3.3.5节。

contents.text: ds:DigestValue One. The computed hash value. See Section 4.3.3.6 of [W3C.XMLSIG].
contents.zh-CHS: ds:DigestValue一。计算出的哈希值。参见[W3C.XMLSIG]第4.3.3.6节。

contents.text: ds:CanonicalizationMethod Zero or one. The canonicalization method used on the object being hashed. See Section 4.3.1 of [W3C.XMLSIG].
contents.zh-CHS: ds：规范化方法0或1。对正在散列的对象使用的规范化方法。参见[W3C.XMLSIG]第4.3.1节。

contents.text: Application Zero or one. SOFTWARE. The application used to calculate the hash.
contents.zh-CHS: 应用程序0或1。软件用于计算散列的应用程序。

contents.text: The HashData class has no attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: HashData类没有属性。

contents.text: 3.26.2. FuzzyHash Class
contents.zh-CHS: 3.26.2. FuzzyHash类

contents.text: The FuzzyHash class describes a fuzzy hash and the application used to generate it.
contents.zh-CHS: FuzzyHash类描述了一个模糊散列以及用于生成它的应用程序。

contents.text: Figure 56: The FuzzyHash Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图56:FuzzyHash类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the FuzzyHash class are:
contents.zh-CHS: FuzzyHash类的骨料类别为：

contents.text: FuzzyHashValue One or more. EXTENSION. The computed fuzzy hash value.
contents.zh-CHS: 模糊值是一个或多个值。扩大计算出的模糊散列值。

contents.text: Application Zero or one. SOFTWARE. The application used to calculate the hash.
contents.zh-CHS: 应用程序0或1。软件用于计算散列的应用程序。

contents.text: AdditionalData Zero or more. EXTENSION. Mechanism by which to extend the data model.
contents.zh-CHS: 附加数据为零或更多。扩大用于扩展数据模型的机制。

contents.text: The FuzzyData class has no attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: FuzzyData类没有属性。

contents.text: 3.27. SignatureData Class
contents.zh-CHS: 3.27. 签名数据类

contents.text: The SignatureData class describes different types of digital signatures on an object.
contents.zh-CHS: SignatureData类描述对象上不同类型的数字签名。

contents.text: Figure 57: The SignatureData Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图57：SignatureData类

contents.text: The aggregate class of the SignatureData class is:
contents.zh-CHS: SignatureData类的聚合类为：

contents.text: Signature One or more. A given signature. See Section 4.2 of [W3C.XMLSIG].
contents.zh-CHS: 一个或多个签名。一个给定的签名。参见[W3C.XMLSIG]第4.2节。

contents.text: The SignatureData class has no attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: SignatureData类没有属性。

contents.text: 3.28. IndicatorData Class
contents.zh-CHS: 3.28. 指示数据类

contents.text: The IndicatorData class describes indicators and metadata associated with them.
contents.zh-CHS: IndicatorData类描述了与之相关的指标和元数据。

contents.text: Figure 58: The IndicatorData Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图58：IndicatorData类

contents.text: The aggregate class of the IndicatorData class is:
contents.zh-CHS: IndicatorData类的聚合类为：

contents.text: Indicator One or more. A description of an indicator. See Section 3.29.
contents.zh-CHS: 一个或多个指示器。对指示器的描述。见第3.29节。

contents.text: The IndicatorData class has no attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: IndicatorData类没有属性。

contents.text: 3.29. Indicator Class

The Indicator class describes an indicator. An indicator consists of observable features and phenomenon that aid in the forensic or proactive detection of malicious activity and associated metadata. An indicator can be described outright by referencing or composing previously defined indicators or by referencing observables described in the incident report found in this document.
contents.zh-CHS: Indicator类描述一个指示器。指标由可观察的特征和现象组成，有助于对恶意活动和相关元数据进行法医或主动检测。指标可以通过引用或组合先前定义的指标，或通过引用本文件中事件报告中描述的可观察指标来直接描述。

contents.text:
+------------------------+
| Indicator              |
+------------------------+
| ENUM restriction       |<>----------[ IndicatorID            ]
| STRING ext-restriction |<>--{0..*}--[ AlternativeIndicatorID ]
|                        |<>--{0..*}--[ Description            ]
|                        |<>--{0..1}--[ StartTime              ]
|                        |<>--{0..1}--[ EndTime                ]
|                        |<>--{0..1}--[ Confidence             ]
|                        |<>--{0..*}--[ Contact                ]
|                        |<>--{0..1}--[ Observable             ]
|                        |<>--{0..1}--[ ObservableReference    ]
|                        |<>--{0..1}--[ IndicatorExpression    ]
|                        |<>--{0..1}--[ IndicatorReference     ]
|                        |<>--{0..*}--[ NodeRole               ]
|                        |<>--{0..*}--[ AttackPhase            ]
|                        |<>--{0..*}--[ Reference              ]
|                        |<>--{0..*}--[ AdditionalData         ]
+------------------------+
Figure 59: The Indicator Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图59：指标类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the Indicator class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 指标类的聚合类为：

contents.text: IndicatorID One. An identifier for this indicator. See Section 3.29.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 指示的一个。此指示器的标识符。见第3.29.1节。

contents.text: AlternativeIndicatorID Zero or more. An alternative identifier for this indicator. See Section 3.29.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 交替指示零或更多。此指示器的替代标识符。见第3.29.2节。

contents.text: Description Zero or more. ML_STRING. A free-form text description of the indicator.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明零或更多。ML_字符串。指示器的自由格式文本描述。

contents.text: StartTime Zero or one. DATETIME. A timestamp of the start of the time period during which this indicator is valid.
contents.zh-CHS: 开始计时零或一。日期时间。此指示器有效的时间段开始的时间戳。

contents.text: EndTime Zero or one. DATETIME. A timestamp of the end of the time period during which this indicator is valid.
contents.zh-CHS: 结束时间0或1。日期时间。此指示器有效期间结束的时间戳。

contents.text: Confidence Zero or one. An estimate of the confidence in the quality of the indicator. See Section 3.12.5.
contents.zh-CHS: 信心0或1。对指标质量的置信度的估计。见第3.12.5节。

contents.text: Contact Zero or more. Contact information for this indicator. See Section 3.9.
contents.zh-CHS: 联系零或更多。此指示器的联系信息。见第3.9节。

contents.text: Observable Zero or one. An observable feature or phenomenon of this indicator. See Section 3.29.3.
contents.zh-CHS: 可观察到的零或一。该指示器的可观察特征或现象。见第3.29.3节。

contents.text: ObservableReference Zero or one. A reference to an observable feature or phenomenon defined elsewhere in the document. See Section 3.29.6.
contents.zh-CHS: 可观测参考零或一。对文件中其他地方定义的可观察特征或现象的引用。见第3.29.6节。

contents.text: IndicatorExpression Zero or one. A composition of observables. See Section 3.29.4.
contents.zh-CHS: 指示灯压力为零或一。可见物的组合。见第3.29.4节。

contents.text: IndicatorReference Zero or one. A reference to an indicator. See Section 3.29.7.
contents.zh-CHS: 指示灯参考零或一。对指示器的引用。见第3.29.7节。

contents.text: NodeRole Zero or more. The role of the system in the attack should this indicator be matched to it. See Section 3.18.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 节点数为零或更多。如果此指示器与系统匹配，则系统在攻击中的角色。见第3.18.2节。

contents.text: AttackPhase Zero or more. The phase in an attack life cycle during which this indicator might be seen. See Section 3.29.8.
contents.zh-CHS: 攻击相位为零或更多。攻击生命周期中可以看到此指示器的阶段。见第3.29.8节。

contents.text: Reference Zero or more. A reference to additional information relevant to this indicator. See Section 3.11.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 参考零或更多。参考与该指标相关的其他信息。见第3.11.1节。

contents.text: AdditionalData Zero or more. EXTENSION. Mechanism by which to extend the data model.
contents.zh-CHS: 附加数据为零或更多。扩大用于扩展数据模型的机制。

contents.text: The Indicator class MUST have exactly one instance of an Observable, IndicatorExpression, ObservableReference, or IndicatorReference class.
contents.zh-CHS: Indicator类必须正好有一个Observable、IndicatorExpression、ObservableReference或IndicatorReference类的实例。

contents.text: The StartTime and EndTime classes can be used to define an interval during which the indicator is valid. If both classes are present, the indicator is consider valid only during the described interval. If neither class is provided, the indicator is considered valid during any time interval. If only a StartTime is provided, the indicator is valid anytime after this timestamp. If only an EndTime is provided, the indicator is valid anytime prior to this timestamp.
contents.zh-CHS: StartTime和EndTime类可用于定义指示器有效的时间间隔。如果两个类都存在，则指示符仅在所述间隔期间被认为是有效的。如果未提供任何类别，则该指示器在任何时间间隔内均视为有效。如果只提供开始时间，则该指示器在此时间戳之后的任何时间都有效。如果仅提供EndTime，则该指示器在此时间戳之前的任何时间都有效。

contents.text: The attributes of the Indicator class are:
contents.zh-CHS: The attributes of the Indicator class are:translate error, please retry

contents.text: restriction Optional. ENUM. See Section 3.3.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 限制是可选的。枚举。见第3.3.1节。

contents.text: ext-restriction Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the restriction attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 外部限制可选。一串扩展限制属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: 3.29.1. IndicatorID Class

The IndicatorID class identifies an indicator with a globally unique identifier. The combination of the name and version attributes and the element content form this identifier. Indicators generated by given CSIRT MUST NOT reuse the same value unless they are referencing the same indicator.
contents.zh-CHS: IndicatorID类使用全局唯一标识符标识指示器。名称和版本属性以及元素内容的组合构成了该标识符。给定CSIRT生成的指标不得重用相同的值，除非它们引用相同的指标。

contents.text: Figure 60: The IndicatorID Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图60：指示符类

contents.text: The content of the class is of type ID and specifies an identifier for an indicator.
contents.zh-CHS: 该类的内容为ID类型，并为指示符指定标识符。

contents.text: The attributes of the IndicatorID class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 指示类的属性包括：

contents.text: name Required. STRING. An identifier describing the CSIRT that created the indicator. In order to have a globally unique CSIRT name, the fully qualified domain name associated with the CSIRT MUST be used. This format is identical to the IncidentID@name attribute in Section 3.4.
contents.zh-CHS: 需要名称。一串描述创建指示器的CSIRT的标识符。为了拥有全局唯一的CSIRT名称，必须使用与CSIRT关联的完全限定域名。此格式与IncidentID@name第3.4节中的属性。

contents.text: version Required. STRING. A version number of an indicator.
contents.zh-CHS: 版本要求。一串指示器的版本号。

contents.text: 3.29.2. AlternativeIndicatorID Class
contents.zh-CHS: 3.29.2. 交替指示类

contents.text: The AlternativeIndicatorID class lists alternative identifiers for an indicator.
contents.zh-CHS: AlternativeIndicatorID类列出指示器的可选标识符。

contents.text:
+-------------------------+
| AlternativeIndicatorID  |
+-------------------------+
| ENUM restriction        |<>--{1..*}--[ IndicatorReference ]
| STRING ext-restriction  |
+-------------------------+
Figure 61: The AlternativeIndicatorID Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图61：可选指示符类

contents.text: The aggregate class of the AlternativeIndicatorID class is:
contents.zh-CHS: 替代指示类别的合计类别为：

contents.text: IndicatorReference One or more. A reference to an indicator. See Section 3.29.7.
contents.zh-CHS: 指示符号引用一个或多个。对指示器的引用。见第3.29.7节。

contents.text: The attributes of the AlternativeIndicatorID class are:
contents.zh-CHS: AlternativeIndicator类的属性包括：

contents.text: restriction Optional. ENUM. See Section 3.3.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 限制是可选的。枚举。见第3.3.1节。

contents.text: ext-restriction Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the restriction attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 外部限制可选。一串扩展限制属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: 3.29.3. Observable Class
The Observable class describes a feature and phenomenon that can be observed or measured for the purposes of detecting malicious behavior.
contents.zh-CHS: Observable类描述了可观察或测量的特征和现象，用于检测恶意行为。

contents.text:
+------------------------+
| Observable             |
+------------------------+
| ENUM restriction       |<>--{0..1}--[ System                      ]
| STRING ext-restriction |<>--{0..1}--[ Address                     ]
|                        |<>--{0..1}--[ DomainData                  ]
|                        |<>--{0..1}--[ Service                     ]
|                        |<>--{0..1}--[ EmailData                   ]
|                        |<>--{0..1}--[ WindowsRegistryKeysModified ]
|                        |<>--{0..1}--[ FileData                    ]
|                        |<>--{0..1}--[ CertificateData             ]
|                        |<>--{0..1]--[ RegistryHandle              ]
|                        |<>--{0..1}--[ RecordData                  ]
|                        |<>--{0..1}--[ EventData                   ]
|                        |<>--{0..1}--[ Incident                    ]
|                        |<>--{0..1}--[ Expectation                 ]
|                        |<>--{0..1}--[ Reference                   ]
|                        |<>--{0..1}--[ Assessment                  ]
|                        |<>--{0..1}--[ DetectionPattern            ]
|                        |<>--{0..1}--[ HistoryItem                 ]
|                        |<>--{0..1}--[ BulkObservable              ]
|                        |<>--{0..*}--[ AdditionalData              ]
+------------------------+
Figure 62: The Observable Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图62：可观察类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the Observable class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 可观察类别的聚合类别为：

contents.text: System Zero or one. A System observable. See Section 3.17.
contents.zh-CHS: 系统0或1。可观察的系统。见第3.17节。

contents.text: Address Zero or one. An Address observable. See Section 3.18.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 地址为零或一。可观察到的地址。见第3.18.1节。

contents.text: DomainData Zero or one. A DomainData observable. See Section 3.19.
contents.zh-CHS: 域数据为零或一。一个可观察的领域。见第3.19节。

contents.text: Service Zero or one. A Service observable. See Section 3.20.
contents.zh-CHS: 服务零或一。可观察到的服务。见第3.20节。

contents.text: EmailData Zero or one. An EmailData observable. See Section 3.21.
contents.zh-CHS: 电子邮件数据零或一。可观察到的数据。见第3.21节。

contents.text: WindowsRegistryKeysModified Zero or one. A WindowsRegistryKeysModified observable. See Section 3.23.
contents.zh-CHS: WindowsRegistryKeys修改为零或一。WindowsRegistryKeysModified可观察。见第3.23节。

contents.text: FileData Zero or one. A FileData observable. See Section 3.25.
contents.zh-CHS: 文件数据为零或一。可观察到的文件数据。见第3.25节。

contents.text: CertificateData Zero or one. A CertificateData observable. See Section 3.24.
contents.zh-CHS: 认证数据为零或一。可观察到的数据。见第3.24节。

contents.text: RegistryHandle Zero or one. A RegistryHandle observable. See Section 3.9.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 注册表句柄为零或一。可观察到的注册表句柄。见第3.9.1节。

contents.text: RecordData Zero or one. A RecordData observable. See Section 3.22.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 记录数据0或1。可观察到的记录数据。见第3.22.1节。

contents.text: EventData Zero or one. An EventData observable. See Section 3.14.
contents.zh-CHS: 事件数据为零或一。可观察到的事件数据。见第3.14节。

contents.text: Incident Zero or one. An Incident observable. See Section 3.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 事件零或一。可观察到的事件。见第3.2节。

contents.text: Expectation Zero or one. An Expectation observable. See Section 3.15.
contents.zh-CHS: 期望值为零或一。可以观察到的期望。见第3.15节。

contents.text: Reference Zero or one. A Reference observable. See Section 3.11.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 参考零或一。可观察到的参考。见第3.11.1节。

contents.text: Assessment Zero or one. An Assessment observable. See Section 3.12.
contents.zh-CHS: 评估零或一。可观察到的评估。见第3.12节。

contents.text: DetectionPattern Zero or one. A DetectionPattern observable. See Section 3.10.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 检测模式为0或1。可观察到的探测模式。见第3.10.1节。

contents.text: HistoryItem Zero or one. A HistoryItem observable. See Section 3.13.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 历史项目0或1。可以观察到的历史事件。见第3.13.1节。

contents.text: BulkObservable Zero or one. A bulk list of observables. See Section 3.29.3.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 可观测的零或一。大量的可观测数据。见第3.29.3.1节。

contents.text: AdditionalData Zero or more. EXTENSION. Mechanism by which to extend the data model.
contents.zh-CHS: 附加数据为零或更多。扩大用于扩展数据模型的机制。

contents.text: The Observable class MUST have exactly one of the possible child classes.
contents.zh-CHS: 可观察类必须正好有一个可能的子类。

contents.text: The attributes of the Observable class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 可观察类的属性包括：

contents.text: restriction Optional. ENUM. See Section 3.3.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 限制是可选的。枚举。见第3.3.1节。

contents.text: ext-restriction Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the restriction attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 外部限制可选。一串扩展限制属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: 3.29.3.1. BulkObservable Class
The BulkObservable class allows the enumeration of a single type of observable without requiring each one to be encoded individually in multiple instances of the same class.
contents.zh-CHS: BulkObservable类允许枚举单个类型的observable，而无需在同一类的多个实例中单独编码每个类型。

contents.text: The type attribute describes the type of observable listed in the child BulkObservableList class. The BulkObservableFormat class optionally provides additional metadata.
contents.zh-CHS: type属性描述子BulkObservableList类中列出的可观察对象的类型。BulkObserverFormat类可以选择提供额外的元数据。

contents.text: Figure 63: The BulkObservable Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图63：可观察类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the BulkObservable class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 可观察类别的聚合类别为：

contents.text: BulkObservableFormat Zero or one. Provides additional metadata about the observables enumerated in the BulkObservableList class. See Section 3.29.3.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 以0或1的形式显示。提供有关BulkObservableList类中枚举的可观察对象的附加元数据。见第3.29.3.1.1节。

contents.text: BulkObservableList One. STRING. A list of observables, one per line. Each line is separated with either a LF character or CR and LF characters. The type attribute specifies which observables will be listed.
contents.zh-CHS: 第一个。一串一个可观察的列表，每行一个。每行用LF字符或CR和LF字符分隔。type属性指定将列出哪些观察值。

contents.text: AdditionalData Zero or more. EXTENSION. Mechanism by which to extend the data model.
contents.zh-CHS: 附加数据为零或更多。扩大用于扩展数据模型的机制。

contents.text: The attributes of the BulkObservable class are:
contents.zh-CHS: BulkObservable类的属性包括：

contents.text: type Optional. ENUM. The type of the observable listed in the child ObservableList class. These values are maintained in the "BulkObservable-type" IANA registry per Section 10.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 类型可选。枚举。子ObservableList类中列出的可观察对象的类型。根据第10.2节，这些值保存在“可观测类型”IANA注册表中。

contents.text: 1. asn. Autonomous System Number (per the Address@category attribute).
contents.zh-CHS: 1. asn。自主系统编号（根据Address@category属性）。

contents.text: 2. atm. Asynchronous Transfer Mode (ATM) address (per the Address@category attribute).
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 自动取款机。异步传输模式（ATM）地址（根据Address@category属性）。

contents.text: 3. e-mail. Email address (per the Address@category attribute).
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 电子邮件电邮地址（按Address@category属性）。

contents.text: 4. ipv4-addr. IPv4 host address in dotted-decimal notation, e.g., 192.0.2.1 (per the Address@category attribute).
contents.zh-CHS: 4. ipv4地址。点十进制表示法的IPv4主机地址，例如192.0.2.1（根据Address@category属性）。

contents.text: 5. ipv4-net. IPv4 network address in dotted-decimal notation, slash, significant bits, e.g., 192.0.2.0/24 (per the Address@category attribute).
contents.zh-CHS: 5. ipv4网络。点十进制表示法、斜杠、有效位的IPv4网络地址，例如192.0.2.0/24（按Address@category属性）。

contents.text: 6. ipv4-net-mask. IPv4 network address in dotted-decimal notation, slash, network mask in dotted-decimal notation, i.e., 192.0.2.0/255.255.255.0 (per the Address@category attribute).
contents.zh-CHS: 6. ipv4网络掩码。点十进制表示法中的IPv4网络地址、斜杠、点十进制表示法中的网络掩码，即192.0.2.0/255.255.255.0（根据Address@category属性）。

contents.text: 7. ipv6-addr. IPv6 host address, e.g., 2001:DB8::3 (per the Address@category attribute).
contents.zh-CHS: 7. ipv6地址。IPv6主机地址，例如，2001:DB8:：3（根据Address@category属性）。

contents.text: 8. ipv6-net. IPv6 network address, slash, significant bits, e.g., 2001:DB8::/32 (per the Address@category attribute).
contents.zh-CHS: 8. ipv6网络。IPv6网络地址、斜杠、有效位，例如2001:DB8:：/32（根据Address@category属性）。

contents.text: 9. ipv6-net-mask. IPv6 network address, slash, network mask (per the Address@category attribute).
contents.zh-CHS: 9. ipv6网络掩码。IPv6网络地址、斜杠、网络掩码（根据Address@category属性）。

contents.text: 10. mac. Media Access Control (MAC) address, i.e., a:b:c:d:e:f (per the Address@category attribute).
contents.zh-CHS: 10. 雨衣。媒体访问控制（MAC）地址，即a:b:c:d:e:f（根据Address@category属性）。

contents.text: 11. site-uri. A URL or URI for a resource (per the Address@category attribute).
contents.zh-CHS: 11. 站点uri。资源的URL或URI（根据Address@category属性）。

contents.text: 12. domain-name. A fully qualified domain name or part of a name (e.g., fqdn.example.com, example.com).
contents.zh-CHS: 12. 域名。完全限定的域名或名称的一部分（例如，fqdn.example.com，example.com）。

contents.text: 13. domain-to-ipv4. A mapping of FQDN to IPv4 address specified as a comma-separated list (e.g., "fqdn.example.com, 192.0.2.1").
contents.zh-CHS: 13. 域到ipv4。FQDN到指定为逗号分隔列表的IPv4地址的映射（例如，“FQDN.example.com，192.0.2.1”）。

contents.text: 14. domain-to-ipv6. A mapping of FQDN to IPv6 address specified as a comma-separated list (e.g., "fqdn.example.com, 2001:DB8::3").
contents.zh-CHS: 14. 域到ipv6。FQDN到指定为逗号分隔列表的IPv6地址的映射（例如，“FQDN.example.com，2001:DB8:：3”）。

contents.text: 15. domain-to-ipv4-timestamp. Same as domain-to-ipv4 but with a timestamp (in the DATETIME format) of the resolution (e.g., "fqdn.example.com, 192.0.2.1, 2015-06-11T00:38:31-06:00").
contents.zh-CHS: 15. 域到ipv4的时间戳。与域到ipv4相同，但具有解析的时间戳（日期时间格式）（例如，“fqdn.example.com，192.0.2.112015-06-11T00:38:31-06:00”）。

contents.text: 16. domain-to-ipv6-timestamp. Same as domain-to-ipv6 but with a timestamp (in the DATETIME format) of the resolution (e.g., "fqdn.example.com, 2001:DB8::3, 2015-06-11T00:38:31-06:00").
contents.zh-CHS: 16. 域到ipv6的时间戳。与域到ipv6相同，但具有解析的时间戳（日期时间格式）（例如，“fqdn.example.com，2001:DB8:：32015-06-11T00:38:31-06:00”）。

contents.text: 17. ipv4-port. An IPv4 address, port, and protocol tuple (e.g., 192.0.2.1, 80, TCP). The protocol name corresponds to the "Keyword" column in the "Assigned Internet Protocol Numbers" registry [IANA.Protocols].
contents.zh-CHS: 17. ipv4端口。IPv4地址、端口和协议元组（例如192.0.2.1、80、TCP）。协议名称对应于“分配的Internet协议编号”注册表[IANA.Protocols]中的“关键字”列。

contents.text: 18. ipv6-port. An IPv6 address, port, and protocol tuple (e.g., 2001:DB8::3, 80, TCP). The protocol name corresponds to the "Keyword" column in the "Assigned Internet Protocol Numbers" registry [IANA.Protocols].
contents.zh-CHS: 18. ipv6端口。IPv6地址、端口和协议元组（例如，2001:DB8:：3、80、TCP）。协议名称对应于“分配的Internet协议编号”注册表[IANA.Protocols]中的“关键字”列。

contents.text: 19. windows-reg-key. A Microsoft Windows registry key.
contents.zh-CHS: 19. windows注册表项。Microsoft Windows注册表项。

contents.text: 20. file-hash. A file hash. The format of this hash is described in the Hash class that MUST be present in a sibling BulkObservableFormat class.
contents.zh-CHS: 20. 文件散列。文件散列。此哈希的格式在哈希类中描述，该哈希类必须存在于同级BulkObserverFormat类中。

contents.text: 21. email-x-mailer. An X-Mailer field from an email.
contents.zh-CHS: 21. email-x-mailer。电子邮件中的X-Mailer字段。

contents.text: 22. email-subject. An email subject line.
contents.zh-CHS: 22. 电子邮件主题。电子邮件主题行。

contents.text: 23. http-user-agent. A User Agent field from an HTTP request header (e.g., "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; WOW64; rv:38.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/38.0").
contents.zh-CHS: 23. http用户代理。HTTP请求头中的用户代理字段（例如，“Mozilla/5.0（Windows NT 6.3；WOW64；rv:38.0）Gecko/20100101 Firefox/38.0”）。

contents.text: 24. http-request-uri. The Request URI from an HTTP request header.
contents.zh-CHS: 24. http请求uri。来自HTTP请求头的请求URI。

contents.text: 25. mutex. The name of a system mutex (mutual exclusion lock).
contents.zh-CHS: 25. 互斥。系统互斥锁（互斥锁）的名称。

contents.text: 26. file-path. A file path (e.g., "/tmp/local/file", "c:\windows\system32\file.sys").
contents.zh-CHS: 26. 文件路径。文件路径（例如“/tmp/local/file”、“c:\windows\system32\file.sys”）。

contents.text: 27. user-name. A username.
contents.zh-CHS: 27. 用户名。用户名。

contents.text: 28. ext-value. A value used to indicate that this attribute is extended and the actual value is provided using the corresponding ext-* attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 28. 外部值。一个值，用于指示此属性已扩展，并使用相应的ext-*属性提供实际值。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: ext-type Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the type attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: ext类型可选。一串扩展类型属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: 3.29.3.1.1. BulkObservableFormat Class
The ObservableFormat class specifies metadata about the format of an observable enumerated in a sibling BulkObservableList class.
contents.zh-CHS: ObserverFormat类指定有关在同级BulkObserverBelist类中枚举的可观测数据格式的元数据。

contents.text: Figure 64: The BulkObservableFormat Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图64:BulkObserverFormat类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the BulkObservableFormat class are:
contents.zh-CHS: BulkObservableFormat类别的聚合类别为：

contents.text: Hash Zero or one. Describes the format of a hash. See Section 3.26.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 散列0或1。描述哈希的格式。见第3.26.1节。

contents.text: AdditionalData Zero or more. EXTENSION. Mechanism by which to extend the data model.
contents.zh-CHS: 附加数据为零或更多。扩大用于扩展数据模型的机制。

contents.text: The BulkObservableFormat class has no attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: BulkObserverFormat类没有属性。

contents.text: Either Hash or AdditionalData MUST be present.
contents.zh-CHS: 必须存在哈希或附加数据。

contents.text: 3.29.4. IndicatorExpression Class
contents.zh-CHS: 3.29.4. 指示剂压力等级

contents.text: The IndicatorExpression describes an expression composed of observed phenomenon, features, or indicators. Elements of the expression can be described directly, reference relevant data from other parts of a given IODEF document, or reference previously defined indicators.
contents.zh-CHS: 指示符表达式描述由观察到的现象、特征或指示符组成的表达式。表达式的元素可以直接描述，可以引用给定IODEF文档其他部分的相关数据，也可以引用以前定义的指标。

contents.text: All child classes of a given instance of IndicatorExpression form a boolean algebraic expression where the operator between them is determined by the operator attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: 给定IndicatorExpression实例的所有子类形成一个布尔代数表达式，其中它们之间的运算符由运算符属性确定。

contents.text:
+--------------------------+
| IndicatorExpression      |
+--------------------------+
| ENUM operator            |<>--{0..*}--[ IndicatorExpression  ]
| STRING ext-operator      |<>--{0..*}--[ Observable           ]
|                          |<>--{0..*}--[ ObservableReference  ]
|                          |<>--{0..*}--[ IndicatorReference   ]
|                          |<>--{0..1}--[ Confidence           ]
|                          |<>--{0..*}--[ AdditionalData       ]
+--------------------------+
Figure 65: The IndicatorExpression Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图65：指示灯压力等级

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the IndicatorExpression class are:
contents.zh-CHS: 指示器压力等级的聚合等级为：

contents.text: IndicatorExpression Zero or more. An expression composed of other observables or indicators. See Section 3.29.4.
contents.zh-CHS: 指示灯压力为零或更多。由其他可观察物或指示器组成的表达式。见第3.29.4节。

contents.text: Observable Zero or more. A description of an observable. See Section 3.29.3.
contents.zh-CHS: 可观察到的零或更多。对可观察事物的描述。见第3.29.3节。

contents.text: ObservableReference Zero or more. A reference to an observable. See Section 3.29.6.
contents.zh-CHS: 可观测参考零或更多。对可观察到的事物的引用。见第3.29.6节。

contents.text: IndicatorReference Zero or more. A reference to an indicator. See Section 3.29.7.
contents.zh-CHS: 指示器参考零或更多。对指示器的引用。见第3.29.7节。

contents.text: Confidence Zero or one. An estimate of the confidence in the quality of the terms expressed in the expression. See Section 3.12.5.
contents.zh-CHS: 信心0或1。对表达式中表达的术语质量的置信度的估计。见第3.12.5节。

contents.text: AdditionalData Zero or more. EXTENSION. Mechanism by which to extend the data model.
contents.zh-CHS: 附加数据为零或更多。扩大用于扩展数据模型的机制。

contents.text: The attributes of the IndicatorExpression class are:
contents.zh-CHS: IndicatorExpression类的属性包括：

contents.text: operator Optional. ENUM. The operator to be applied between the child elements. See Section 3.29.5 for parsing guidance. The default value is "and". These values are maintained in the "IndicatorExpression-operator" IANA registry per Section 10.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 操作员可选。枚举。要在子元素之间应用的运算符。解析指南见第3.29.5节。默认值为“和”。根据第10.2节的规定，这些值保存在IANA注册表中的“指示符显示运算符”中。

contents.text: 1. not. negation operator.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 不否定运算符。

contents.text: 2. and. conjunction operator.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 和连接运算符。

contents.text: 3. or. disjunction operator.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 或析取算子。

contents.text: 4. xor. exclusive disjunction operator.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 异或。排他析取算子。

contents.text: ext-operator Optional. STRING. A means by which to extend the operator attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
contents.zh-CHS: ext运算符可选。一串扩展运算符属性的方法。见第5.1.1节。

contents.text: 3.29.5. Expressions with IndicatorExpression
contents.zh-CHS: 3.29.5. 带指示符的表达式

contents.text: Boolean algebraic expressions can be used to specify relationships between observables and indicators. These expressions are constructed through the use of the operator attribute and parent-child relationships in IndicatorExpressions. These expressions should be parsed as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 布尔代数表达式可用于指定观测值和指标之间的关系。这些表达式是通过使用指示符表达式中的运算符属性和父子关系构建的。这些表达式应按如下方式进行分析：

contents.text: 1. The operator specified by the operator attribute is applied between each of the child elements of the immediate parent IndicatorExpression element. If no operator attribute is specified, it should be assumed to be the conjunction operator (i.e., operator="and").
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 运算符属性指定的运算符应用于直接父指示符pression元素的每个子元素之间。如果未指定运算符属性，则应假定它是连词运算符（即，operator=“and”）。

contents.text: 2. A nested IndicatorExpression element with a parent IndicatorExpression is the equivalent of a parentheses in the expression.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 带有父IndicatorExpression的嵌套IndicatorExpression元素相当于表达式中的括号。

contents.text: The following examples in Figures 66 through 70 illustrate these parsing rules:
contents.zh-CHS: 图66至图70中的以下示例说明了这些解析规则：

contents.text:
1     : <IndicatorExpression>
2 [O1]:    <Observable>..</Observable>
3 [O2]:    <Observable>..</Observable>
4     : </IndicatorExpression>
Equivalent expression: (O1 AND O2)
contents.zh-CHS: 等价表达式：（O1和O2）

contents.text: Figure 66: Nested Elements in an IndicatorExpression without an Operator Attribute Specified
contents.zh-CHS: 图66：未指定运算符属性的指示符表达式中的嵌套元素

contents.text:
1     : <IndicatorExpression operator="or">
2 [O1]:    <Observable>..</Observable>
3 [O2]:    <Observable>..</Observable>
4     : </IndicatorExpression>
Equivalent expression: (O1 OR O2)
contents.zh-CHS: 等效表达式：（O1或O2）

contents.text: Figure 67: Nested Elements in an IndicatorExpression with an Operator Attribute Specified
contents.zh-CHS: 图67：指定运算符属性的指示符表达式中的嵌套元素

contents.text:
1     : <IndicatorExpression operator="or">
2     :    <IndicatorExpression operator="or">
3 [O1]:      <Observable>..</Observable>
4 [O2]:      <Observable>..</Observable>
5     :    </IndicatorExpression>
6 [O3]:    <Observable>..</Observable>
7     : </IndicatorExpression>
Equivalent expression: ((O1 OR O2) OR O3)
contents.zh-CHS: 等效表达式：（（O1或O2）或O3）

contents.text: Figure 68: Nested Elements with a Recursive IndicatorExpression with an Operator Attribute Specified
contents.zh-CHS: 图68：带有递归指示符的嵌套元素Pression，指定了运算符属性

contents.text:
1     : <IndicatorExpression operator="not">
2     :    <IndicatorExpression operator="and">
3 [O1]:      <Observable>..</Observable>
4 [O2]:      <Observable>..</Observable>
5     :    </IndicatorExpression>
6     : </IndicatorExpression>
Equivalent expression: (NOT (O1 AND O2))
contents.zh-CHS: 等价表达式：（非（O1和O2））

contents.text: Figure 69: A Recursive IndicatorExpression with an Operator Attribute Specified
contents.zh-CHS: 图69：指定运算符属性的递归指示符表达式

contents.text:
1                          :    <IndicatorExpression operator="or">
 2                          :      <IndicatorExpression>
 3 [O1 with low confidence] :        <Observable>..</Observable>
 4                          :        <Confidence rating="low" />
 5                          :      </IndicatorExpression>
 6                          :      <IndicatorExpression>
 7 [O2 with high confidence]:        <Observable>..</Observable>
 8                          :        <Confidence rating="high" />
 9                          :      </IndicatorExpression>
10                          :    </IndicatorExpression>
Equivalent expression: ((O1) OR (O2))
contents.zh-CHS: 等效表达式：（（O1）或（O2））

contents.text: Figure 70: Varying Confidence on Particular Observables
contents.zh-CHS: 图70：特定观测值的不同置信度

contents.text: Invalid algebraic expressions while valid XML MUST NOT be specified.
contents.zh-CHS: 代数表达式无效，但不能指定有效的XML。

contents.text: 3.29.6. ObservableReference Class
contents.zh-CHS: 3.29.6. 可观测参照类

contents.text: The ObservableReference describes a reference to an observable feature or phenomenon described elsewhere in the document.
contents.zh-CHS: ObserverReference描述了对文档中其他地方描述的可观察特征或现象的引用。

contents.text: The ObservableReference class has no content.
contents.zh-CHS: ObserverReference类没有内容。

contents.text: Figure 71: The ObservableReference Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图71：ObserverReference类

contents.text: The ObservableReference class has no content.
contents.zh-CHS: ObserverReference类没有内容。

contents.text: The attribute of the ObservableReference class is:
contents.zh-CHS: ObserverReference类的属性是：

contents.text: uid-ref Required. IDREF. An identifier that serves as a reference to a class in the IODEF document. The referenced class will have this identifier set in its observable-id attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: 需要uid ref。伊德里夫。作为IODEF文档中类的引用的标识符。被引用的类将在其observable id属性中设置此标识符。

contents.text: 3.29.7. IndicatorReference Class
contents.zh-CHS: 3.29.7. 指示符引用类

contents.text: The IndicatorReference describes a reference to an indicator. This reference may be to an indicator described in this IODEF document or in a previously exchanged IODEF document.
contents.zh-CHS: 指示器参考描述了对指示器的参考。该参考可能是指本IODEF文件或先前交换的IODEF文件中描述的指标。

contents.text: The IndicatorReference class has no content.
contents.zh-CHS: IndicatorReference类没有内容。

contents.text: Figure 72: The IndicatorReference Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图72：指示符引用类

contents.text: The attributes of the IndicatorReference class are:
contents.zh-CHS: IndicatorReference类的属性包括：

contents.text: uid-ref Optional. IDREF. An identifier that references an Indicator class in the IODEF document. The referenced Indicator class will have this identifier set in its IndicatorID class.
contents.zh-CHS: uid ref可选。伊德里夫。引用IODEF文档中指标类的标识符。引用的指示符类将在其指示符类中设置此标识符。

contents.text: euid-ref Optional. STRING. An identifier that references an IndicatorID not in this IODEF document.
contents.zh-CHS: euid ref可选。一串引用不在此IODEF文档中的指示符的标识符。

contents.text: version Optional. STRING. A version number of an indicator.
contents.zh-CHS: 版本可选。一串指示器的版本号。

contents.text: Either the uid-ref or the euid-ref attribute MUST be set.
contents.zh-CHS: 必须设置uid ref或euid ref属性。

contents.text: 3.29.8. AttackPhase Class
contents.zh-CHS: 3.29.8. 攻击阶段类

contents.text: The AttackPhase class describes a particular phase of an attack life cycle.
contents.zh-CHS: AttackPhase类描述攻击生命周期的特定阶段。

contents.text: Figure 73: The AttackPhase Class
contents.zh-CHS: 图73:AttackPhase类

contents.text: The aggregate classes of the AttackPhase class are:
contents.zh-CHS: AttackPhase类的聚合类为：

contents.text: AttackPhaseID Zero or more. STRING. An identifier for the phase of the attack.
contents.zh-CHS: 攻击相位ID为零或更多。一串攻击阶段的标识符。

contents.text: URL Zero or more. URL. A URL to a resource describing this phase of the attack.
contents.zh-CHS: URL为零或更多。网址。描述此攻击阶段的资源的URL。

contents.text: Description Zero or more. ML_STRING. A free-form text description of this phase of the attack.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明零或更多。ML_字符串。此攻击阶段的自由格式文本描述。

contents.text: AdditionalData Zero or more. EXTENSION. A mechanism by which to extend the data model.
contents.zh-CHS: 附加数据为零或更多。扩大用于扩展数据模型的机制。

contents.text: AttackPhase MUST have at least one instance of a child class.
contents.zh-CHS: AttackPhase必须至少有一个子类的实例。

contents.text: The AttackPhase class has no attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: AttackPhase类没有属性。

contents.text: 4. Processing Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 处理注意事项

contents.text: This section provides additional requirements and guidance on creating and processing IODEF documents.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节提供了有关创建和处理IODEF文档的附加要求和指导。

contents.text: 4.1. Encoding

Every IODEF document MUST begin with an XML declaration and MUST specify the XML version used. The character encoding MUST also be explicitly specified. UTF-8 [RFC3629] SHOULD be used unless UTF-16 [RFC2781] is necessary. Encodings other than UTF-8 and UTF-16 SHOULD NOT be used. The IODEF conforms to all XML data-encoding conventions and constraints.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个IODEF文档必须以XML声明开头，并且必须指定使用的XML版本。还必须明确指定字符编码。除非需要UTF-16[RFC2781]，否则应使用UTF-8[RFC3629]。不应使用UTF-8和UTF-16以外的编码。IODEF符合所有XML数据编码约定和约束。

contents.text: The XML declaration with UTF-8 character encoding will read as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 采用UTF-8字符编码的XML声明如下所示：

contents.text: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
Certain characters have special meaning in XML and MUST not appear in literal form. Per Section 2.4 of [W3C.XML], these characters MUST be escaped with a numeric character or entity reference.
contents.zh-CHS: 某些字符在XML中有特殊含义，不能以文字形式出现。根据[W3C.XML]第2.4节，这些字符必须用数字字符或实体引用转义。

contents.text: 4.2. IODEF Namespace
contents.zh-CHS: 4.2. IODEF命名空间

contents.text: The IODEF schema declares a namespace of "urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:iodef-2.0" and registers it per [W3C.XMLNS]. Each IODEF document MUST include a valid reference to the IODEF schema using the "xsi:schemaLocation" attribute. An example of such a declaration would look as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: IODEF模式声明了一个名称空间“urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:IODEF-2.0”，并根据[W3C.XMLNS]注册它。每个IODEF文档都必须使用“xsi:schemaLocation”属性包含对IODEF模式的有效引用。这种声明的一个例子如下：

contents.text:
<IODEF-Document
   version="2.00" lang="en-US"
   xmlns:iodef="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:iodef-2.0"
   xsi:schemaLocation="urn:ietf:params:xmls:schema:iodef-2.0" ...>
4.3. Validation

IODEF documents MUST be well-formed XML. It is RECOMMENDED that recipients validate the document against the schema described in Section 8. However, mere conformance to this schema is not sufficient for a semantically valid IODEF document. The text of Section 3 describes further formatting and constraints, including some that cannot be conveniently encoded in the schema. These MUST also be considered by an IODEF implementation. Furthermore, the enumerated values present in this document are a static list that will be incomplete over time as select attributes can be extended by a corresponding IANA registry per Section 10.2. Therefore, IODEF
contents.zh-CHS: IODEF文档必须是格式良好的XML。建议收件人根据第8节中描述的模式验证文档。然而，对于语义上有效的IODEF文档来说，仅仅遵从此模式是不够的。第3节的文本描述了进一步的格式和约束，包括一些不能方便地在模式中编码的内容。IODEF实现还必须考虑这些问题。此外，本文件中的枚举值是一个静态列表，随着时间的推移，该列表将不完整，因为根据第10.2节，选择属性可以由相应的IANA注册表扩展。因此，IODEF

contents.text: implementations SHOULD periodically update their schema and MAY need to update their parsing algorithms to incorporate newly registered values.
contents.zh-CHS: 实现应该定期更新其模式，并且可能需要更新其解析算法以合并新注册的值。

contents.text: 4.4. Incompatibilities with v1
contents.zh-CHS: 4.4. 与v1不兼容

contents.text: The IODEF data model in this document makes a number of changes to [RFC5070]. These changes were largely additive -- classes and enumerated values were added. However, some incompatibilities between [RFC5070] and this new specification were introduced. These incompatibilities are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档中的IODEF数据模型对[RFC5070]进行了许多更改。这些变化在很大程度上是累加性的——添加了类和枚举值。然而，[RFC5070]与该新规范之间存在一些不兼容之处。这些不兼容性如下所示：

contents.text: o The IODEF-Document@version attribute is set to "2.0".
contents.zh-CHS: o IODEF-Document@version属性设置为“2.0”。

contents.text: o Attributes with enumerated values can now also be extended with IANA registries.
contents.zh-CHS: o 具有枚举值的属性现在也可以通过IANA注册表进行扩展。

contents.text: o All iodef:MLStringType classes use xml:lang. IODEF-Document also uses xml:lang.
contents.zh-CHS: o 所有iodef:MLStringType类都使用xml:lang。iodef文档也使用xml:lang。

contents.text: o The Service@ip_protocol attribute was renamed to @ip-protocol.
contents.zh-CHS: o 这个Service@ip_protocol属性已重命名为@ip协议。

contents.text: o The Node/NodeName class was removed in favor of representing domain names with Node/DomainData/Name class. The Node/DataTime class was also removed, so that the Node/DomainData/ DateDomainWasChecked class can represent the time at which the name-to-address resolution occurred.
contents.zh-CHS: o 删除了Node/NodeName类，以便用Node/DomainData/Name类表示域名。Node/DataTime类也被删除，因此Node/DomainData/DateDomainWasChecked类可以表示名称到地址解析发生的时间。

contents.text: o The Node/NodeRole class was moved to System/NodeRole.
contents.zh-CHS: o Node/NodeRole类已移动到System/NodeRole。

contents.text: o The Reference class is now defined by [RFC7495].
contents.zh-CHS: o 引用类现在由[RFC7495]定义。

contents.text: o The data previously represented in the Impact class is now in the SystemImpact and IncidentCategory classes. The Impact class has been removed.
contents.zh-CHS: o 以前在Impact类中表示的数据现在在SystemImpact和IncidentCategory类中。冲击等级已被删除。

contents.text: o The semantics of Counter@type are now represented in Counter@unit.
contents.zh-CHS: o 语义Counter@type现在在Counter@unit.

contents.text: o The IODEF-Document@formatid attribute has been renamed to @format-id.
contents.zh-CHS: o IODEF-Document@formatid属性已重命名为@format-id。

contents.text: o The Incident/ReportTime class is no longer required. However, the GenerationTime class is required.
contents.zh-CHS: o 事件/报告时间类不再是必需的。但是，GenerationTime类是必需的。

contents.text: o The Fax class was removed and is now represented by a generic Telephone class.
contents.zh-CHS: o Fax类已被删除，现在由通用电话类表示。

contents.text: o The Telephone, Email, and PostalAddress classes were redefined from improved internationalization.
contents.zh-CHS: o 电话、电子邮件和邮递类是从改进的国际化重新定义的。

contents.text: o The "ipv6-net-mask" value was removed from the category attribute of Address.
contents.zh-CHS: o 已从地址的类别属性中删除“ipv6网络掩码”值。

contents.text: 5. Extending the IODEF
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 扩展IODEF

contents.text: In order to support the dynamic nature of security operations, the IODEF data model will need to continue to evolve. This section discusses how new data elements can be incorporated into the IODEF. There is support to add additional enumerated values and new classes. Adding additional attributes to existing classes is not supported.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了支持安全操作的动态性，IODEF数据模型需要继续发展。本节讨论如何将新数据元素合并到IODEF中。支持添加额外的枚举值和新类。不支持向现有类添加其他属性。

contents.text: These extension mechanisms are designed so that adding new data elements is possible without requiring modifications to this document. Extensions can be implemented publicly or privately. With proven value, well-documented extensions can be incorporated into future versions of the specification.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些扩展机制的设计可以在不需要修改本文档的情况下添加新的数据元素。扩展可以公开或私下实现。有了经验证的价值，文档化的扩展可以被合并到规范的未来版本中。

contents.text: 5.1. Extending the Enumerated Values of Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 5.1. 扩展属性的枚举值

contents.text: Additional enumerated values can be added to select attributes either through the use of specially marked attributes with the "ext-" prefix or through a set of corresponding IANA registries. The former approach allows for the extension to remain private. The latter approach is public.
contents.zh-CHS: 通过使用带有“ext-”前缀的特殊标记属性或通过一组相应的IANA注册表，可以添加额外的枚举值以选择属性。前一种方法允许扩展保持私有。后一种方法是公开的。

contents.text: 5.1.1. Private Extension of Enumerated Values
contents.zh-CHS: 5.1.1. 枚举值的私有扩展

contents.text: The data model supports adding new enumerated values to an attribute without public registration. For each attribute that supports this extension technique, there is a corresponding attribute in the same element whose name is identical but with a prefix of "ext-". This special attribute is referred to as the extension attribute. The attribute being extended is referred to as an extensible attribute. For example, an extensible attribute named "foo" will have a corresponding extension attribute named "ext-foo". An element may have many extensible attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 数据模型支持在不进行公共注册的情况下向属性添加新的枚举值。对于支持此扩展技术的每个属性，同一元素中都有一个名称相同但前缀为“ext-”的对应属性。此特殊属性称为扩展属性。正在扩展的属性称为可扩展属性。例如，名为“foo”的可扩展属性将具有名为“ext foo”的相应扩展属性。一个元素可能有许多可扩展属性。

contents.text: In addition to a corresponding extension attribute, each extensible attribute has "ext-value" as one its possible enumerated values. Selection of this particular value in an extensible attribute signals that the extension attribute contains data. Otherwise, this "ext-value" value has no meaning.
contents.zh-CHS: 除了相应的扩展属性外，每个扩展属性都有“ext value”作为其可能的枚举值之一。在可扩展属性中选择此特定值表示扩展属性包含数据。否则，此“ext value”值没有意义。

contents.text: In order to add a new enumerated value to an extensible attribute, the value of this attribute MUST be set to "ext-value", and the new desired value MUST be set in the corresponding extension attribute. For example, extending the type attribute of the SystemImpact class would look as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 为了向可扩展属性添加新的枚举值，必须将该属性的值设置为“ext value”，并且必须在相应的扩展属性中设置新的所需值。例如，扩展SystemImpact类的type属性如下所示：

contents.text: <SystemImpact type="ext-value" ext-type="new-attack-type">
A given extension attribute MUST NOT be set unless the corresponding extensible attribute has been set to "ext-value".
contents.zh-CHS: 除非相应的可扩展属性已设置为“ext value”，否则不得设置给定的扩展属性。

contents.text: 5.1.2. Public Extension of Enumerated Values
contents.zh-CHS: 5.1.2. 枚举值的公共扩展

contents.text: The data model also supports publicly extending select enumerated attributes. A new entry can be added by registering a new entry in the appropriate IANA registry. Section 10.2 provides a mapping between the extensible attributes and their corresponding registry. Section 4.3 discusses the XML validation implications of this type of extension. All extensible attributes that support private extensions also support public extensions.
contents.zh-CHS: 数据模型还支持公开扩展选择枚举属性。可以通过在适当的IANA注册表中注册新条目来添加新条目。第10.2节提供了可扩展属性与其对应注册表之间的映射。第4.3节讨论了这种扩展的XML验证含义。所有支持私有扩展的可扩展属性也支持公共扩展。

contents.text: 5.2. Extending Classes
contents.zh-CHS: 5.2. 扩展类

contents.text: Classes of the EXTENSION (iodef:ExtensionType) type can extend the data model. They provide the ability to have new atomic or XML-encoded data elements in all of the top-level classes of the Incident class and in a few of the complex subordinate classes. As there are multiple instances of the extensible classes in the data model, there is discretion on where to add a new data element. It is RECOMMENDED that the extension be placed in the most closely related class to the new information.
contents.zh-CHS: 扩展（iodef:ExtensionType）类型的类可以扩展数据模型。它们提供了在事件类的所有顶级类和一些复杂的下级类中拥有新的原子或XML编码的数据元素的能力。由于数据模型中有多个可扩展类的实例，因此可以自行决定在何处添加新的数据元素。建议将扩展名放在与新信息最密切相关的类中。

contents.text: Extensions using the atomic data types (i.e., all values of the dtype attributes other than "xml") MUST:
contents.zh-CHS: 使用原子数据类型（即除“xml”之外的所有dtype属性值）的扩展必须：

contents.text: 1. Set the element content to the desired value, and
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 将元素内容设置为所需的值，然后

contents.text: 2. Set the dtype attribute to correspond to the data type of the element content.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 将dtype属性设置为与元素内容的数据类型相对应。

contents.text: The following guidelines exist for extensions using XML (i.e., dtype="xml"):
contents.zh-CHS: 对于使用XML（即dtype=“XML”）的扩展，有以下指导原则：

contents.text: 1. The element content of the extensible class MUST be set to the desired value, and the dtype attribute MUST be set to "xml".
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 可扩展类的元素内容必须设置为所需的值，并且dtype属性必须设置为“xml”。

contents.text: 2. The extension schema MUST declare a separate namespace. It is RECOMMENDED that these extensions have the prefix "iodef-". This recommendation makes readability of the document easier by allowing the reader to infer which namespaces relate to IODEF by inspection.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 扩展架构必须声明一个单独的命名空间。建议这些扩展具有前缀“iodef-”。此建议允许读者通过检查推断哪些名称空间与IODEF相关，从而使文档的可读性更容易。

contents.text: 3. It is RECOMMENDED that extension schemas follow the naming convention of the IODEF data model. This too improves the readability of extended IODEF documents. The names of all elements SHOULD be capitalized. For elements with composed names, a capital letter SHOULD be used for each word. Attribute names SHOULD be in lowercase. Attributes with composed names SHOULD be separated by a hyphen.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 建议扩展模式遵循IODEF数据模型的命名约定。这也提高了扩展IODEF文档的可读性。所有元素的名称都应大写。对于具有组合名称的元素，每个单词应使用大写字母。属性名称应为小写。具有组合名称的属性应以连字符分隔。

contents.text: 4. Implementations that encounter an unrecognized element, attribute, or attribute value in a supported namespace SHOULD reject the document as a syntax error.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 在受支持的命名空间中遇到无法识别的元素、属性或属性值的实现应将文档作为语法错误拒绝。

contents.text: 5. There are security and performance implications in requiring implementations to dynamically download schemas at runtime. Therefore, implementations MUST NOT download schemas at runtime unless the appropriate precautions are taken. Implementations also need to contend with the potential of significant network and processing issues.
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 要求实现在运行时动态下载模式涉及到安全性和性能问题。因此，除非采取适当的预防措施，否则实现不能在运行时下载模式。实现还需要应对潜在的重大网络和处理问题。

contents.text: 6. Some adopters of the IODEF may have private schema definitions that are not publicly available. Thus, implementations may encounter IODEF documents with references to private schemas that may not be resolvable. Hence, IODEF document recipients MUST be prepared for a schema definition in an IODEF document never to resolve.
contents.zh-CHS: 6. IODEF的某些采用者可能具有不公开的私有模式定义。因此，实现可能会遇到对私有模式的引用可能无法解析的IODEF文档。因此，IODEF文档收件人必须为IODEF文档中的模式定义做好准备，以确保永远不会解析。

contents.text: The following schema and XML document excerpt provide a template for an extension schema and its use in the IODEF document.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下模式和XML文档摘录为扩展模式及其在IODEF文档中的使用提供了模板。

contents.text: This example schema defines a namespace of "iodef-extension1" and a single element named "newdata".
contents.zh-CHS: 这个示例模式定义了一个名称空间“iodef-extension1”和一个名为“newdata”的元素。

contents.text:
<xs:schema
   targetNamespace="iodef-extension1.xsd"
   xmlns:iodef-extension1="iodef-extension1.xsd"
   xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
   attributeFormDefault="unqualified"
   elementFormDefault="qualified">
 <xs:import
      namespace="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:iodef-2.0"
      schemaLocation=" urn:ietf:params:xml:schema:iodef-2.0"/>

<xs:element name="newdata" type="xs:string" />
</xs:schema>
The following XML excerpt demonstrates the use of the above schema as an extension to the IODEF.
contents.zh-CHS: 下面的XML摘录演示了如何使用上述模式作为IODEF的扩展。

contents.text:
<IODEF-Document
       version="2.00" lang="en-US"
       xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:iodef-2.0"
       xmlns:iodef=" urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:iodef-2.0"
       xmlns:iodef-extension1="iodef-extension1.xsd"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xsi:schemaLocation="iodef-extension1.xsd">
      <Incident purpose="reporting">
      ...
        <AdditionalData dtype="xml" meaning="xml">
          <iodef-extension1:newdata>
           Field that could not be represented elsewhere
          </iodef-extension1:newdata>
        </AdditionalData>
      </Incident>
</IODEF-Document>
5.3. Deconflicting Private Extensions
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3. 消除冲突的私有扩展

contents.text: To disambiguate which private extension is used in an IODEF document, the data model provides a means to identify the source of an extension. Two attributes in the IODEF-Document class, private-enum-name and private-enum-id, are used to specify this attribution. Only a single private extension can be identified in a given IODEF-Document.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了消除IODEF文档中使用哪个私有扩展的歧义，数据模型提供了一种识别扩展源的方法。IODEF文档类中的两个属性，private enum name和private enum id，用于指定此属性。在给定的IODEF文档中只能标识一个专用扩展。

contents.text: If an implementor has a single private extension, then only the private-enum-name attribute needs to be specified. Multiple distinct private extensions or versioning of a single extension can be attributed by also setting the corresponding private-num-id attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果实现者只有一个私有扩展，那么只需要指定私有枚举名称属性。通过设置相应的private num id属性，可以对多个不同的私有扩展或单个扩展的版本控制进行属性化。

contents.text: The following XML excerpt demonstrates the specification of a private extension from "example.com" with an identifier of "13".
contents.zh-CHS: 下面的XML摘录演示了“example.com”中标识符为“13”的私有扩展的规范。

contents.text:
<IODEF-Document
       version="2.00" lang="en-US"
       private-enum-name="example.com"
       private-enum-id="13" ...>
      ...
</IODEF-Document>
If an unrecognized private extension is encountered in processing, the recipient MAY reject the entire document as a syntax error.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果在处理过程中遇到无法识别的专用扩展名，收件人可能会因为语法错误而拒绝整个文档。

contents.text: 6. Internationalization Issues
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 国际化问题

contents.text: Internationalization and localization is of specific concern to the IODEF as it facilitates operational coordination with a diverse set of partners. The IODEF implements internationalization by relying on XML constructs and through explicit design choices in the data model.
contents.zh-CHS: 国际化和本地化是IODEF特别关注的问题，因为它有助于与不同合作伙伴的运营协调。IODEF通过依赖XML构造和数据模型中的显式设计选择来实现国际化。

contents.text: Since the IODEF is implemented as an XML schema, it supports different character encodings, such as UTF-8 and UTF-16, that are possible with XML. Additionally, each IODEF document MUST specify the language in which its content is encoded. The language can be specified with the attribute "xml:lang" (per Section 2.12 of [W3C.XML]) in the top-level element (i.e., IODEF-Document) and lets all other elements inherit that definition. All IODEF classes with a free-form text definition (i.e., all those defined with type iodef:MLStringType) can also specify a language different from the rest of the document.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于IODEF是作为XML模式实现的，因此它支持不同的字符编码，如UTF-8和UTF-16，这在XML中是可能的。此外，每个IODEF文档必须指定其内容的编码语言。可以在顶级元素（即IODEF文档）中使用属性“xml:lang”（根据[W3C.xml]第2.12节）指定该语言，并允许所有其他元素继承该定义。所有具有自由格式文本定义的IODEF类（即所有使用IODEF:MLStringType类型定义的类）也可以指定不同于文档其余部分的语言。

contents.text: The data model supports multiple translations of free-form text. All ML_STRING (iodef:MLStringType) classes have a one-to-many cardinality to their parent. This allows the identical text translated into different languages to be encoded in different instances of the same class with a common parent. This design also enables the creation of a single document containing all the translations. The IODEF implementation SHOULD extract the appropriate language relevant to the recipient.
contents.zh-CHS: 数据模型支持自由格式文本的多个翻译。所有ML_STRING（iodef:MLStringType）类对其父类都具有一对多基数。这允许翻译成不同语言的相同文本在具有公共父类的同一类的不同实例中进行编码。此设计还支持创建包含所有翻译的单个文档。IODEF实现应提取与接收方相关的适当语言。

contents.text: Related instances of a given iodef:MLStringType class that are translations of each other are identified by a common identifier set in the translation-id attribute. The example below shows three instances of a Description class expressed in three different languages. The relationship between these three instances of the Description class is conveyed by the common value of "1" in the translation-id attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: 给定iodef:MLStringType类的相关实例是彼此的翻译，它们由翻译id属性中设置的公共标识符标识。下面的示例显示了用三种不同语言表示的描述类的三个实例。描述类的这三个实例之间的关系由translation id属性中的公共值“1”表示。

contents.text:
<IODEF-Document version="2.00" xml:lang="en" ...>
  <Incident purpose="reporting">
    ...
    <Description translation-id="1"
                 xml:lang="en">English</Description>
    <Description translation-id="1"
                 xml:lang="de">Englisch</Description>
    <Description translation-id="1"
                 xml:lang="fr">Anglais</Description>

The IODEF balances internationalization support with the need for interoperability. While the IODEF supports different languages, the data model also relies heavily on standardized enumerated attributes that can crudely approximate the contents of the document. With this approach, a CSIRT should be able to make some sense of an IODEF document it receives even if the free-form text data elements are written in a language unfamiliar to the recipient.
contents.zh-CHS: IODEF平衡了国际化支持和互操作性需求。虽然IODEF支持不同的语言，但数据模型也严重依赖标准化的枚举属性，这些属性可以粗略地近似文档的内容。通过这种方法，CSIRT应该能够理解它接收到的IODEF文档，即使自由格式的文本数据元素是用接收者不熟悉的语言编写的。

contents.text: 7. Examples
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 例子

contents.text: This section provides examples of IODEF documents. These examples do not represent the full capabilities of the data model or the only way to encode particular information.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节提供了IODEF文档的示例。这些示例并不代表数据模型的全部功能，也不是编码特定信息的唯一方法。

contents.text: 7.1. Minimal Example
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1. 最小示例

contents.text: A document containing only the mandatory elements and attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 仅包含必需元素和属性的文档。

contents.text:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!-- Minimum IODEF document -->
<IODEF-Document version="2.00" xml:lang="en"
   xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:iodef-2.0"
   xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
   xsi:schemaLocation=
